One thing I hate about it is that it is not working so well with my Android phone, no battery status, which is so inconvenient. Does apple expect everyone to use iphone? Overall, it is great for the price.

Bought for $129 at Costco. Love them on day one. I have an older car (2007 Honda Accord). I love this car so much. It’s perfect. In mint condition and paid for. But I would love for it to have Bluetooth. I have an Apple cord. But these headphones are so much better. I feel like I’ve spent the past (15!) years with my phone on speaker on my lap. This is soooo much of an upgrade if this is what you are doing! You can drive with just one ear in and have total freedom. I now vacuum and dust my house with these in. The sound quality is amazing. Seriously, this is some of the best money I’ve spent lately.

Original Apple AirPods. I like how they’re compact and automatically sync and turn on when you put them into your ears. Best of all, no wires! They don’t stay in my ears very well, but neither do the earphones that came with the iPhone so it’s to be expected. I use the silicone covers for a better fit. The only thing I hate is that the AirPod Pros came out a month after I bought these. Those have noise cancellation that you can switch on and off, and you customize the fit, but they’re also twice the price.

review title: I could not get bluetooth to connect to my IMac or anything else for that matter
review_body: I was given a pair of cheap Airpod "knock-off" brand airpod clones and was astounded how good they sounded. I thought if these are this good the real Apple Airpods must be fantastic. To my dismay the Apple Airpods would not bluetooth connect to anything, not even my iMac. So I am sorry that I cannot include a sound quality rating or any rating, they just would not work. I returned them and will just be happy with my cheap brand.
I own a lot of Apple products but this is the one that I really didn’t like. Not worth the money. Doesn’t stay in ears, uncomfortable, and not good sound quality

review title: Continuous audio the battery doesn't last a hour.
review_body:
People are high this fad saying the battery lasts 6+ hours. True Bluetooth ear bugs last 6+ hours when you DON'T USE THEM, like for occasional calls. But for continuous music or audio books the battery doesn't last an hour.
I forget the things in my ear, that's not a good thing. Noise cancellation? Google ear bud block noise, these don't.
I use tether ear buds that cost $10 now. Sorry I bought into this overprice Bluetooth fad.

These fit much better than the newer and larger Gen 3 which I bought and returned to Costco. Just didn’t fit well in my ears and I don’t have small ears. I don’t notice a discernible difference in sound quality between gen2 and gen3.

I bought these for $99 here and another pair at Costco for $89. These will sit in the box until my current ones die! Stocked up before they were all gone. They are that good to me.

I loved this product until it stopped working.
I am able to hear the caller but the caller can only hear my voice very, very faintly.
When I called Apple to help with troubleshooting the problem, I was told that the serial number wasn't from a registered product and they can only assume that I was sold a knock-off.

I would like this resolved, I would like to have a product that works.
I purchased the Airpods from Amazon on 4.16.20. Serial number: GMVC67KJLX2Y.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

review title: Tested the AirPods Pro And the Regular ones.
review_body: I purchased the AirPods and Airpods Pro. I decided to keep the regular ones just because they actually fit my ear a lot better EVEN THOUGH the AirPods Pro have the adjustable features. If it wasn’t that I would have probably kept the AirPods Pro. The regular ones are annoying when you have to tap on/off, pause/start... the first tap never works. Sometimes you have to tap like an idiot. With the Pro it just always works. If you like the noise canceling, pro ones are great. If you want to know whats going on around you the regular ones are better. ( airpods pro do have an option of turning off the noise canceling but even with it off i felt like I still wasn’t 100% aware of my surroundings)

I loved these. Very handy, good sound and what looked like at the time good quality. That lasted four months and they simply sputtered for awhile then stopped completely. I’ve always favored Apple products but no longer. These are just short of a direct rip off. I’m out 129.00 and Apple is laughing all the way to the bank. I suppose it doesn’t bother them in the least but they lost a customer that had dealt with them over 40 years. This is the last time.

review title: Amazon did not honor free music trial and buds not suitable for gardening
review_body: This is obviously a great product to use when on the phone. However, I was tempted by these to listen to music whilst weeding without having to carry the iphone around. I should have done more research. The range is a few feet, farther than that and the music just cuts in and out. The buds also don't stay in my ears as I move. Back to the shuffle and headphones I guess. My biggest gripe was that I never received the e-mail to start a free music trial. I contacted Amazon three different times and their customer service was awful. They claimed they couldn't see the deal on the product page-even had me send screen shots to prove it. Made me feel like I was lying to them. The deal is still there!! They never got back to me.

I only bought these because I had an Amazon gift card and I got a great discount and I love them! I thought they were like the basic corded earbuds from Apple but they are so much better! The sound quality is AMAZING! I can talk for about 3+ hours before they need to be charged. I still haven't a low batter from listening to music alone. The charging case powers the AirPods back to full in 15-20 mins and I'm amazed! The case gives me about 5-6 full charges before I need to hook it up to a charger. I'll never used any other earbuds.

review title: Perfect performance, very comfortableto wear for hours at a time.
review_body:
I purchased these to sync with a GPS mapping app on my phone. The app is intended for cycling applications. After setting up my route the app gives me turn by turn instructions while riding. The air pods ensured that I never missed a turn over several days of cycling in both urban and rural settings.

The buds are comfortable to wear and remain very secure in my ears even while exerting myself on a bike and perspiring in hot weather.

review title: Could not answer or hang up calls
review_body: The first pair I got I could not answer or hang up calls with one tap or 2 taps. I reset them a couple of times, watched you tube videos to be sure I did this right - to no avail. I would have to run around looking for my phone to answer it while wearing the air pods. Siri worked fine sending and receiving messages however, music and listening to podcasts was ok also. So I sent the first pair back to Amazon and got another set. Same problem again! Very frustrating. I sent those back and Amazon refunded my purchase price. Can't figure it out but not good for me.

I bloody love these things.
I don't have an iPhone, I'm an android lady and I still love these things.
Sound quality and microphone quality are second to none, and they last forever battery, wise.
Admittedly that get a little sore in my ears after a few hours, but....hours. And I have really small ears.
I went through four other sets of headphones though again that were a fraction of the price and they all sucked in one way or another, and I ended up returning them, very disappointed. I sucked it up and bought these and never looked back.
If you're hemmin' and hawin'...just buy them already.

review title: Delivered as promised. Amazons had never failed me.
review_body: Brand new iPhone earplugs. Work as a charm. Always used other cheaper brand but if you have an iPhone , I will recommend to buy iPhone earphones. It is worth the price. Several options to use. The only thing I was not give the option to buy the apple protection but is OK since price was cheap.

review title: Cheap design with premium features (in other words fancy garbage)
review_body: At first these headphones were great. Then the new wore off. I found that they were getting quieter and didn’t block out ANY ambient noise which for me was a huge turn off because I use music as an escape from the screaming of my family and shop environment. Secondly about 5 months in the left side speaker blew. Now for most people they wouldn’t be bothered but for me I’m kinda mad because i spent 150 dollars of my good money for this garbage that doesn’t sound good, and broke way before it’s duty was over. The fitment was also a big turn off, they would constantly fall out of my ears and were uncomfortable to wear. Then the bane of their existence, the case would load up with so much metal filings that it wouldn’t be able to shut and charge the dang things. I’d have to clean it out with alcohol once a week just so they would charge. The only thing I liked about these was, how they looked, how they read texts to you, how they paired with your phone seamlessly and the sound they made when they hit the bottom of the garbage can. Avoid at all costs!!! They’re a cheap headphone with premium features that’s why they’re so expensive.

I love these earbuds. I have a few pair, and these make the others look like trash. Pairing couldn’t be simpler, they are lightweight and super comfortable, fit well, and couldn’t be simpler to use. These are great earbuds.

The reason I only gave them a lower rSting is the sound quality. It’s not bad, but it’s also pretty far from great. The sound is nicely balanced, but lacks any punch. They do sound amazing with a few albums, but that is rare. The sound is usually flat and lacking dynamics. Still, they sound good enough.

Overall, though, I am happy. I do recommend them, but with a caveat.

review title: Pretty and shiny, but not the most practical design
review_body:
I bought these as a birthday gift for my dad. My dad kept complaining they keep falling out of his ear. I didn’t believe him, so I decided to test them out myself.

I tried them out listening to music while working and doing stuff around the house. I also took them jogging. They look really pretty, like most Apple products. They sound okay, but noise cancellation is non existent. They didn’t fall out of my ear, but they are not exactly secure either. It’s a weird feeling. Sometimes I forget they are there and everything is great, but sometimes I’m constantly checking to make sure they’re secure. If they had the little rubber ear tips like most other similar products, it would have been much better.

I’m not a big fan of the commands they implemented either. For example you’re supposed to tap them to answer a call or play the next song. Not a bad idea, but their implementation is underwhelming. Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn’t.

Oh and Siri voice commands are disappointing. Very hit or miss.

Apple, you’ve got work to do. Frustrating product. Don’t recommend.

Very disappointed that upon opening my BRAND NEW airpods that there were pieces of lint/hair inside the charging case. Wtf. Even if these were refurbished - which they aren't - it would be unacceptable to sell a dirty product to a customer. How does that even pass quality control? One airpod also has something weird going on with the mesh part where the sound comes out. It's dark. Idk if that's just a weird defect or ear wax, but I'm getting a replacement. Will update once replacement arrives.

Extremely disappointed in this purchase. I ordered my first pair last year and they were perfect. Brand new, never used, fresh packaging. I lost both head phones , silly me, and decided to reorder to ensure I got the same product. Boy was I wrong. When I first opened the package I knew something was wrong. The box was dented and not covered in the standard Apple wrap. I open the AirPods and the first thing I noticed was the charging cord had a red stain on it and the right ear bud had ear wax on them. At this point I was curious as to if they were refurbished or fake. I clean them, flip open the case to begin connecting them and they say “Tash’s AirPods”...my names Leonah...still curious I connect them and was greater with the connection sound which followed by horrific static and the sound completely dropping from the right AirPod.

Needless to say I will be returning these ASAP and going to the Apple store to buy a fresh pair.

I pace a lot when I am on the phone. I also have to use my computer while on the phone a lot as well. I've always loved the sound quality of the corded earbuds and so I never invested in the wireless ones. Now that I have them I have to say I LOVE them. They are flawless. They connect instantly. They last a long time.
I no longer accidentally disconnect when I drop my phone or move away from it!! And the sound quality is outstanding. Love them!

I love love love these. I have been wanting them since they came out and could not afford them. Thanks to being $50.00 off I was able to get them. They are perfect. My daughter got them all hooked up for me and wow. SO SO SO good. Calls are clear. Music and audible books sound great. I have been using the apple wired pair forever. I have to untangle them all the time and they get caught on stuff. I am so excited.

review title: Product Had Broke Within A Month Of Purchased
review_body: I had purchased the AirPods lil less then a month ago & they were working totally fine yesterday and then today I put them on & my left AirPods had sounded static.. I have tried to unpair them from my phone & had paired them to another phone thinking it might be the phone & the same thing.. & I had went to hit up the people I’d bought them from “amazon” & they had nowhere to contact them?? soo i am stuck with a $100+ head phones that sound like $hit

I had the first generation that no loner held a charge. I tried several high rated $40-$60 ear pods however they all sounded too bright. So I bought another pair of Apples. The sound quality was and is the best feature and for that, I really like them and glad I have them. The other few features work on and off. They last, on a charge for, I guess, 6 maybe 8 hours ---> I am very pleased. They charge up fast in their rechargeable case.
5 stars on the sound and size, 3 stars on the rest.
I would buy then again.

Amazing accessory to an apple iPhone/iPad/iPod. Like others, I had been perfectly happy with my wired, complimentary headphones from Apple until I tried these - game changer.

Whether you're listening to streaming TV, a podcast, music, or on a phone call, these airpods truly simplify the experience and have a good quality (assuming that you're not an audiophile). Especially in the world of WFH, I find that I use these airpods (paired with my cellphone) nearly continuously for work phone calls.

Battery life and charge speed are amazing. Sound quality is great. They don’t always stay in your ears if your moving around a lot but once you get used to them they are fine, they don’t fall out, they just feel like they are about to sometimes. I would recommend buying a case and skins for them if you are using them to work or workout as they get dirty very easily. They pair instantly to Apple products which is convenient for the most part unless you are around a bunch of devices that you use at once then it can get annoying and you have to make sure you clarify which device your using or it might try to hand off every time you move from one to another. Good solid sound quality and this coming from someone who does music production. Regret not buying pros only because you only get 2 functions with the Left/Right tap feature on these, but otherwise they are great product overall.

review title: I broke my corded set, bought these to replace it. They are the worst.
review_body: People can't hear me on zoom calls. They say I should robotic. I have tried zoom on my iphone and my computer. Doesn't matter my voice is bad. The charge dies within an hour and the sound quality for me is garbage. I may have gotten a bum set because I've heard nothing but rave reviews from people. But over all very disappointing and a waste of money for the set I have.

review title: If Your Kid Wants Them Make Them Buy Them
review_body:
My son really wanted a pair so I told him if he purchased he could get and sure enough he saved until he could purchase. He really loves these things at the moment. Says they are great with sound and battery life, I do think he misses some of the features from his previous less expensive pair but all the kids have AirPods and that's what he had to have.
Sure enough he hasn't been carrying around as often or using as often but he is using and sayings they are great. Me personally not sure the money is worth the name and I'm an Apple gal always listening to my music. He was uber excited for the arrival and the first week to show off but after that not so much use.

I resisted buying these for years thinking they were a waste of money. Boy, was I wrong. They recently went on sale for $119 and I had just lost a pair of ear buds, so I decided to get them. OMG. The are great!! They are discreet (I have long hair), have great sound quality, and are perfect for both music and talking on the phone. You have to plug in your case to charge the AirPods, but that does not bother me in the least. I use them daily, at work and at home, and I kick myself that I didn’t buy them a few years ago!

My niece has had hers for a while and loved them. So I thought I would give them a try.

The first issue I have with them is the battery does not last longer than 3 hours. (That might be my bad, maybe they are not designed to.) If I am going to be on a call longer than 3 hours, I do like that i can use one earbud and the other can stay charging in the case. I do lose any noise canceling that it does that way. In addition sometimes the one earbud will not have audio. I have to put in and take it out of the case a few times to get it to work, so as long as I try switching the earbud before the one dies I can talk longer than 3 hours.

The next issue I have is they do not always connect to my iPhone 11 and/or my Samsung Note 10+. I actually have better luck with the Samsung than the iPhone. Once I get the Samsung to connect it will almost always do so, the audio might cut in and out but they connect. The iPhone on the other hand will say it is connected but there will be no audio. It is frustrating, maybe it is the two phones that cause the issues, I am not sure. I bought them because so many loved them, but I would not recommend them at unless you really do not talk long on your phone and only had one phone. Then maybe you would have less issues than I have had.

review title: Pros and cons, but overall disappointed.
review_body: These don't stay in my ears, I had to buy separate in-ear style pieces. They don't always connect with my iPhone and I have to "forget this device" in Bluetooth settings and start over. The auto pause function when removing from ears doesn't always work either. (Very annoying when you lose your place in your audiobook!). This happens whether I have the in-ear pieces on or not. The sound quality is good, but I don't think there is any noise cancelling effect at all. I can't hear the audio clearly when vacuuming like I can with other cheap wired headphones. The only reason I didn't return these for another brand is that they can be used one at a time unlike other brands. Overall I'm disappointed with Apple, especially for the price. They would be totally worth it if they worked well and had different options for earbud styles.

I love AirPods. If you have an iPhone, it’s one button to activate pairing and a simple tap on the screen. Not an audiophile sound quality, but still really good. I use them when I go running, they stay in my ear really well. A good measure would be if the wired EarPods stay in, you’re good. I can’t use ear buds that have the rubber tips, I have tried many kinds and they all hurt to keep in more than 10min. These are my solution to that, my runs can sometimes be an hour and a half, no problem.

review title: Apple says that they are better than their first AirPods. It's probably true, but we shall see.
review_body: I purchased my first AirPods set in 2017 and was never impressed with their performance or battery life. I only have one phone now. iPhone 7. No land line anymore. And I use AirPods for practically all my personal and business calls, as I don't like to hold the phone next to my ear. AirPods (gen 1) used to lose connection to the iPhone during the calls, and usually would not last connected a full 1 hour conference call. I purchased this AirPods (gen 2) in Oct 2019 and time will tell if they hold the connection to the iPhone more reliably and the battery lasts longer. Four stars for now, expecting them to be better than AirPods gen 1, but they still need to earn the fifth start.

They are real 2nd generation. I'm not sure why some people mentioned they got 1st gen. For a moment I also thought they sent me the 1st gen, because I already have one pair of 2nd gen and the ones I already own have a green light outside on the case, and the airpods I got from this seller has the green light inside (you have to open the case to see it). I realized that is because I had wireless charging case (light outside), while here I got the regular charging case (charging light inside). I was not aware of that difference. Best advice: before you comment you got 1st gen please check your serial number on Apple website to validate. It will show you what model you got. Besides that: they are the best pods, I wear them all the time, I even fall asleep with them and they're super comfortable. I am used to wearing only one, then whenever it dies, I just take another one, while the first one will charge.

These do EXACTLY what they're supposed to do. I'm a casual headphone user so I don't know what's considered "good" sound quality but these do the job if you're listening to music on your phone or whatever. I wouldn't say they're especially noise-cancelling but that's not really a priority for me. I'm impressed with the battery life. They last HOURS, which I didn't expect. Are they worth $130--well that's up to you. I got these for $90 on sale, which was great. But if you want wireless earbuds that are guaranteed to work for everyday use, then I'd go for it. They also connect to your device pretty easily. At first I thought you had to connect the headphones before you take them out of the charging pod but that was just my stupidity haha.

review title: Great to use for video recording
review_body:
I purchased two sets of these. One for my husband and one for myself to use for teaching online. The AirPods are clear, the microphone pics up well. I've used it to help with amplification while doing live video and although it doesn't replace external auto mics it does help amplify my voice enough that people can hear me.

My husband had another microphone/earpiece to use for teaching his online classes and has told me over and over how much better the AirPods are.

review title: No noise cancellation, but WAY better than PowerBeats wired earphones
review_body:
I was reluctant to join the bandwagon of Airpod users, but I'm happy I made the switch since my PowerBeats and Revjams both died out.

If you want noise cancelling, go for Revjams Active Pro. Could literally ride my back down the highway without the sound of cars destroying my music. However, the Airpods have been absolutely excellent with the ease of connectivity with your bluetooth device, accessing Siri (can customize double-tap function on either airpod to access Siri, skip tracks, pause, etc), and charging. It seems like 15 minutes of charging them in the case gets them back up to 100%, which probably lasts about 3 hours of play time.

Overall, I'm really glad my wife got me these for my birthday Jan 2020. Would NOT go back to RevJams or BeatsPowerless

I’ve wanted the AirPods for months so when I received these as a Christmas gift from my parents I was ecstatic. It was fairly easy syncing the AirPods to my iPhone 7Plus via Bluetooth. I tried both pods on right away, the sound quality was surprisingly great &’ they were pretty comfortable too. After a few hours (roughly 2) they started to get uncomfortable making my ear itch which then made me realize why I never used the headphones that originally came with the iPhone. I had no idea Apple also has the AirPod Pros which look more comfortable so if you want comfort I’d highly recommend stop looking at these &’ head over to the AirPod Pros. They also don’t allow you to go very far from your phone. I had my phone sitting on the coffee table in my living room, I walked out front to take out the trash &’ the music started to get staticky going in & out.

Only plus is being able to charge my phone &’ still listen to my music.

review title: Worked well for about 15 months. Left one failed.
review_body:
They worked well for about 15 months but then the left one failed. I took them to the Apple store and was told they are just outside of warranty and repair would be $70. Pretty disappointing. I used them a lot for video conference calls— the ear piece batteries would last for about 3-hours in calls between charges. Recharged very quickly in the case.

Again, pretty decent but sucks they failed so soon.

Works great with all our Apple devices, nice and seamless connection...sometimes... like anything they have issues and need to be reconnected as they dont do it automatically but when they do its really nice. With aftermarket accessories the Airpods work great for just about any occasion. I love then for work cause I can still hear just fine with my music low if someone needs to talk to me. Battery in the case needs charging often with normal use which is not a huge deal but I find myself with dead earphone all to often as the case doesnt stay charged very long between uses.

Sound quality is awesome, this is my second purchase, I had gotten one for my husband and now I got this one for me. My husband haves no complaints, me in the other hand, think that the headphones are a little loose sometimes and have to be fixing it so it doesn’t fall from my ear, but it’s not that bad, I love the clarity of my calls and music , it gets charged super fast. Very happy with my purchase

review title: Airpod flex with convenience, good integration and a questionable price tag.
review_body: I got caught up with the hype/trend of the airpods. And there are good reason why it is popular. The first thing is the convenience of quickly and easily pairing with your phone or even computer. In terms of sound quality, the airpods doesn't sound at all different from the regular apple earpods. Essentially it is basically bluetooth earpods with the siri assistance built in. (both look the same/same size and everything). There is hardly any noise cancellation since its not that kind of headphone. The mic is okay but, I used it once and it sounds muddle when I tried it to record. One of the biggest plus using airpods is not having to deal with TANGLED WIRES. The airpods have great battery life and it charges really quick. I would say using airpods for around 4 hours leaves it around 70-80% on the airpods it self. Last thing to mention is the price tag, yes it is expensive but, If you're someone who wants no bells or whistle and want a good reliable product, and is okay with the price tag then go with this. Yes there are other headphones that offer more features and maybe even cheaper price. However, It is kind of hard to beat something this easy to use and part of the meme. So it is a great buy!

Checked the serial number on Apple’s website and it says these are legit. But wonder if I got some counterfeits. Why do people say these are so good. The audio quality is horrible compared to the plug in airbuds that you get with your iPhone. And the voice quality is abysmal. I got these specifically for Zoom and Teams calls on my Mac book and people say they can barely hear me. I make calls from my iPhone XS with these and the same issue. I got on sale for $130 but that is till to much for these useless headphones. Going back to the free plug in ear buds. Also, they say 5 hours of battery life. But if you use for talk you only get 2 hours. I am in meetings all day. Useless.

This model of Airpods is the easiest to use. I have an average ear, so they fit perfectly. I purchased the newer version, but missed the tap to answer feature, and had to go back to these. They switch seamlessly between my Apple products.

review title: Didn’t realize I need these until I had them
review_body: If I lost them, I would purchase them again without any doubt. They’re amazing, reliable, and stay in your ears. The phone calls are very clear and bluetooth connects as soon as they touch your ear. I can leave my phone downstairs while staying on a clear call upstairs. I love it.

Alright, I have to eat my words... I thought that I would never buy AirPods, and I thought that I would tolerate them, and i frowned on people with them. I love these. They are so easy to use. Pop them in your ear, the tone sounds and your call or music pops right over. The bluetooth connectivity is great, and the range is solid. I am super happy with the way that they stay in my ears. In-Ear headphones were not an option for me. I have tiny ears, and they either ache constantly or fall out. These do neither of those things. Suck it up, buy them. And definitely buy them a little case with a carabiner. They live on my car keys and I use them a ton!

The green light letting you know they have charged doesn't work. They fit well in the ears, comfortable. The battery life of the case goes down quicker than the ear buds themselves? But the battery life altogether didn’t last 1, 3-hour plane ride. Weird! I need them now so no time to ship back, get new ones, blah blah…they are fine for now. I will purchase my next set directly from Apple so that I know they are authentic and will work correctly. Good enough for now!

At first I wasn't a fan of wireless airpods. I thought they were douchy and people walking around with them seemed to reflect that. I am a true hard-wired headphone type of guy. While I enjoy most Apple products, these are phenomenal! I am a true audiophile and the quality of sound is very good. I saw these priced at the Apple Store for $199, but for a bit less on Amazon, they are worth the price. I added this to my arsenal of devices I carry and I don't mind to have yet another thing to charge and keep track of. The AirPods also are very comfortable and emit a sound when you insert them into your ear. The SIRI activation is also pleasant and nice. Overall I recommend these for those who enjoy great sound quality and convenience!

I came into them all hyped. Watched some reviews on YouTube but kept my hopes up. The fit for my ears is mediocre at best. Noise cancellation is nonexistent. Charging case is a great feature. It’s great for calls also. Would NOT trust these in the gym at all. They are not worth the price. My Beats sound better but AirPods are more portable. Guess my daughter is getting an early present.

**Edit**: Knocking off two stars due to concerns over long term reliability. I've noticed they have issues connecting to my iPhone and the battery life seems to be shortening at a much faster rate than I anticipated.

Like the title says, these earbuds are awesome.

They integrate seamlessly with both my iPhone and Mac and I can easily switch between them with no loss in functionality. As for sound quality, they do well in that department. They sound very similarly to the wired Apple earbuds, and along that same vain, they also fit like them too; if the regular Apple earbuds don't fit well, these won't be much different from that.

In all, these wireless earbuds are great!

I received these headphones as a Christmas gift from a relative. My first choice have not been Apple AirPods but Beats. However, accepting a free gift is always fun. UNTIL you get fake Apple headphones from a third party vendor on Amazon.

On the first connect, everything seemed fine. I sat them down for a second and went to use them again. My phone started freezing and glitching. When I attempted to turn my phone off bc my phone would not disconnect from them, I had an extremely hard time. I connected them to another device and they did the same thing.

I went into the Apple store here recently and discovered that the serial number on the box as listed in the photo have been reprinted on tons of Apple made boxes by the third party host using “true” Apple AirPods serial numbers. They showed me the list.

This is highly disappointing and discrediting to Apple and also Amazon.

If you purchase anything with a name brand on it especially Apple, please take your products to the main distributor to have them vip firm that you have made a legit purchase if you care about the quality of your product.

No, I will not be removing my review. Please handle this accordingly.

I was so happy with these until I got my first notification. They almost blew out my eardrums! Researched and found the only thing you can do about this is to toggle the "change with buttons" under "sounds" on the iPhone. This will take care of the problem UNLESS you change your volume in any other app and then it just reverts back to the ridiculously loud notifications (text, door camera, call, etc.) I need to decide if the convenience of using Siri with these things is worth my long-term hearing or if I should just send them back.

review title: Really really awful. Don’t buy it
review_body: It will work for like a month but then one side stops working. Before purchasing, I saw some other reviewers having the same issue but I hesitated to listen to them and went ahead with the purchase. Now, I’m realizing that I should’ve listened to them. I want to return it but get at least partial refund but that’s not possible before my return window has closed. I wouldn’t recommend anyone to buy this. What’s really disturbing is that it’s an amazon choice, which makes it sounds like it’s the original and quality version of an apple product you’re buying but instead this piece of crap is nothing but disappointment and regrets.

Sound better than I expected and very convenient. My only complaint is that when I ordered it said I would get the latest version (AirPod 2 with H1 chip) and I received the first version AirPod. This is not a big deal as there is apparently not much difference but I thought I would get the latest version. Not worth going through the retuen process dealing with the Chatbot.

Update 4/5/2020 - Checked serial number and Apple says they are AirPod 2. But it did come with the older wired charging case (I did order the wired charging case) which I don't see as a big deal although the LED on the exterior does seem a little better. Happy with sound quality and microphone quality. I'm upping my review to 5 stars. Good quality product, good price, good delivery time. What's not to like?

These definitely belonged to someone before landing in my hands. When I paired them it said “Rita’s AirPods.” There was only two pieces of tape on the outside box and it was dirty. The quality was terrible and the left headphone stopped working. It’s things like this that really discourage me from ordering online. 😞

Shameful, Amazon! This is an out right lie, these are not the latest AirPods, these are the original gen 1 AirPods. I’m a huge Apple fanboy and feel that I should have known better but didn’t notice where the charging light was until after I received them. I bought these for my wife and was quickly embarrassed when the originals, rather than the gen 2 showed up.

I didn’t know what I was missing! I walk a couple of miles each morning and had been using corded earbuds, which I all too often would accidentally catch my hand on, or not have enough length to carry my phone in a pocket. These eliminated those issues. I am also working remotely and have several ZOOM meetings a week. I have started using the Air Pods for those as well. They’re great for working in the yard without having to keep phone in hand or pocket. Sound is very good. Charge time is as advertised and recharge time is quick.

Like it so much! I can absolutely say great quality, I did two times accidents laundry with it. After I pick them up from washer machine , I was afraid of dead AirPods. But they still work well and perfect sounds quality. I use it every day during working or housework, never bother my ears, can hang on all day on my ears. You can see some satraches on my AirPods , you will see how often I use them. In short, great product from Apple, NO. 1 earphones. Never disappoint, recommend it to people who wants earphones.

review title: My nephew loves them, and they arrived earlier than expect. Nice surprise.
review_body:
These airpods are not just attractive but do exactly as they say: they allow you to get a clear sound while blocking out the outside noice. My nephew wanted them, so I thought they were worth the investment.

The charging case is a nice touch, and they are easy to travel with. The added bonus for us was that they arrived almost a week earlier than expected!

Great quality and service.

How could anyone dislike Apple
AirPods? Talk about sound quality, it’s unbelievable. I just cannot get over the phenomenal quality of sound. They come in a nice case and charger to plug into your usb outlet. They charge in no time! The AirPods are also smart. Immediately connects to your phone through blue tooth. You take one out and they immediately turn off but you still have the option to listen with one in the ear. As soon as you open the cute little case they connect immediately to your phone. Best Apple investment ever!

review title: BEST PURCHASE YET on amazon. How did I live without these for so long.
review_body: Been waiting and contemplating for a long time on whether to spend more than $100 on wireless AirPods. After tripping on my headphone cable and having my phone almost fall into a creek, I decided to take the leap. DEFINITELY WORTH EVERY DIME. Battery life is incredible. Even more incredible is the time the AirPods take to recharge once you put them to charge in the charged case. Holy super speed charging. It literally feels like it takes less than 2 to 3 minutes to charge them from 10% to 100%. Best product I have purchased on Amazon so far. Also, I would highly recommend buying a case for your AirPods as soon as you get them. I chose the cartoon looking deadpool and I couldn’t be happier.

review title: NOT a good match for Android users
review_body:
Arrrrrgh! After a long time putting off this purchase because I was unsure whether they would pair well with my Galaxy phone, I finally relented. Only to be disappointed.

The Bluetooth pairing often drops or is sketchy. When that happens, I have to carry my phone close to my ears to catch the signal. Which, essentially, eliminates the need for the earbuds.

When I went to return them, Amazon offered tech support. Which was great because it fixed the problem... for about 2 days. But by the time I got back around to returning them, the window had closed.

Very disappointed that I'm now stuck with a lightly used product I can't return.

review title: Sounds like you aren't wearing earphones
review_body: I only put one star on noise cancellation since these are more for like sound awareness. I like it because you can hear things around you but music quality is still good. Sometimes I even think my phone is playing the music and not the actual headphones. Gift for my brother. Works with non apple products as well

review title: Comfortable wireless earbuds, worth the price
review_body:
These air pods have surprisingly good battery life and are really comfortable to wear. I primarily use my air pods during work. So probably 5-8 hours a work day. I use them intermittently due to having to interact with my coworkers. I charge them every time I have to give someone my attention. As a result of that I've never ran out of battery life in a single day. I also find them extremely comfortable, like I forget they are even there sometimes if I paused my audiobook. While I don't exercise with them, I haven't had one fall out yet during regular use. But I am cautious enough to not use them around water as I fear they might fall out and be damaged in such circumstances.

Unfortunately, we are only allowed one earbud in while we work. Some areas of my workspace are loud due primarily to large AC units and conveyors converging in certain areas. Due to this, I do have one complaint about them. They don't cancel noise very well. I used to have another pair of wireless ear buds and they were much better at cancelling out sound, even with one ear free. As a result I am frequently having to pause my audiobook in these areas as I don't want to blow out one of my eardrums trying to overpower the external sounds with raising the volume of my device.

As to regards about sound quality, I find them good for my purposes. Listening to podcasts and audiobooks in standard quality. I have decent headphones at home if I want an audiophile experience with high quality audio formats especially with music, games, and shows. But the air pods don't necessarily sound terrible. They are just a little annoying to pair between my iphone and pc back and forth. (Not a fan of Macs, sorry apple crowd)

As I only use them while I work, I don't take calls, so I can't comment on the sound receiving end of the earbuds and their use as a headset.

Overall I think they are pretty great product. I did receive the newest model, it was factory sealed and did not appear to have been used. I read a couple of bad reviews and I was particularly worried about receiving a previous model or returned item sold as new. Thankfully everything was fine.

They charge super fast. They last for about 4 hours if on consistently. If you have braids or any type of heavy hair, be careful because it will try to knock them out of your ears. The sound is weird sometimes. It will sound clogged up or it will make it sound more digital. This only happened to me when I opened certain apps. Apps that have ads or music in the background already. The AirPods have trouble processing that I suppose. Over all they connect super easy to your phone like barely any set up. I would say to beware of connecting the AirPods to another device that’s not apple. It works but it is difficult to connect them back to your iPhone after you do that. I had to google it. That’s what the small button is for on it! Other than that I think it’s worth the purchase!

I held off on the airpods because they just looked strange, not to mention how people looked wearing them and I worried they would fall out and I would lose one but those concerns haven't really happened. They fit well, the sound quality is great and you adjust really quick. I also like the solid-ness of them and their case. They don't feel flimsy like some I have seen which isn't a surprise with Apple quality. I ended up getting second pair for gift for sister and she loves them too. Good investment and I LOVE not dealing with headphone wires!!!

These work great. No static like other brands I've tried. And people can actually hear me clearly on phone calls!
The distance was amazing at first, but after about a week it started breaking up if I was more than 30 feet from the phone. Good enough. It's held charge well. I have an Android phone and it connects well. It changes between my phone and computer decently also. Oh, they're also comfortable. My other pair would hurt my ear. These don't. I've only used them for calls and the computer. I haven't tried running with them. They stay in my ear and don't move around and don't hurt.

My wife listens to or reads books constantly when she’s not sewing a quilt or taking care of the grand-babies. She had an off-brand Bluetooth set of air buds but couldn’t get them to pair with each other. Both would pair separately with her iPhone but not both. She took these out of the charging container and like magic they paired instantly with each other and to her phone. Wow! What a difference buying original Apple air pods made. No comparison at all. Thanks Apple!!

These AirPods were great... until they weren't. I have been using them just fine and about a week ago out of nowhere they just stopped connecting to my iPhone. I'll get a connection maybe once every 5 tries and even then I get a weird tinny sound with no bass and then have to try to reconnect again and again. Of course, the return window has closed. Really disappointed and don't know what to do with them now.

I actually really like these headphones for the ease of being able to multi task w/o a cord always attached. Going to the gym and doing intense workouts with minimal adjusting in between. My only complaint is that battery life. As an write this review at 10:15 am, batteries previously charged to 100%, only using to answer calls, my ear buds currently sit at 54%. You’d think with these being the hottest buds on the market, the battery life would be impeccable. Slightly disappointed in that, overall pleased.

Update: just realized their used.

I bought these to replace my Jaybird Freedoms and thought I'd be trading sound quality for convivence and was willing to settle for that. I assumed these would be easy to set up, would turn on and off seamlessly and give me great features, and I assumed they would sound sub par compared to the Jaybirds. I was right on two of those assumptions. The sound quality is in fact on par with Jaybirds. If I have to nitpick they aren't as comfortable as the Jaybirds, but that's not saying they are uncomfortable.

At first I wasn't sure if I should order since some reviewers claimed to get fake AirPods. I went ahead an ordered them a day ago and got them in the mail today. So far I am enjoying them. The package was still wrapped properly when I received it. I went ahead and checked the serial number on the AirPod box on the Apple website and it came back as authentic 2nd generation AirPods. A lot of other people stated they got used AirPods, mine came wrapped properly in the plastic just like they where at the apple store and had all the proper instructions and charger. No sign of being used. I would say if you are considering them they are a great deal, considering you will save $30 buying here vs the apple store.

I debated getting a pair of these as I thought I was content with the pair of earbuds that come with the phone but I’m super glad I purchased these. First of all I feel like these were a wonderful price compared to apple and even as a refurbished product these are amazing. The sound quality is amazing and I love not having a cord dangling around having to deal with. They easily pair with apple devices and thought I haven’t tried pairing with a non apple Bluetooth device it’s supposed to be easy as well. There’s a button the case you press to pair with a non apple Bluetooth device which is convenient. The battery life blows me away. They constantly Stay charged in the case and I have only had to charge the case a couple times in the few months I’ve had these. Very convenient and definitely worth purchasing if you’re on the fence.

These disconnect frequently, normally just the left one... I have tried everything from disconnecting and reconnecting, turning off ear detect, disconnecting all other Bluetooth devices, and many more... nothing helps. These are the worst headphones I’ve ever had the displeasure of purchasing

And to ad, they’re EXTREMELY UNCOMFORTABLE, do yourself a favor and get a better brand that isn’t overpriced

1.) Having owned both of them (i.e. apple AirPods vs galaxy buds, not the pro versions of both ), I can say that the noise cancellation is better in galaxy buds but the quality of the sound from AirPods is out of the world.
2.) Charging is better in AirPods vs galaxy buds, I use it for like 10 mins at a time and it lasts for a day if not less.
3.) Taking off one star because you can still hear noises after wearing this, if you want total cancellation upgrade to the pro version.
4.) Personally, I don't find much use in using a wireless charging one compared to a wired one.

review title: Different than what I bought in 2017.
review_body: I don’t know if I received counterfeit AirPods or if Apple has cut the quality of the product in the last couple years, but the product I received is very inferior to the 2017 models I replaced. The case is lighter; the lid feels light and flimsy, as if it could be twisted off. The pods themselves feel and sound identical to the old ones, but these cut out frequently. Or just the left one will cut and the right one continues on.

This is a wonderful product that I am very impressed with. I usually HATE Apple, but...
*Connects flawlessly to my iPhone. Bat life seems decent.
*Sound quality is great (more than just great)
*Works beautifully with the Pandora app.
*will take calls seamlessly and resume music afterward.
*The earbuds fit & stay in well enough to go rucking for several hours.
*Feels like a quality product that was well made and thought out.

review title: Avoided Bluetooth Headphones Forever - I Was Rewarded For Waiting For The Low Price!
review_body:
I initially hated the shift Apple made when it removed headphone jacks. I have to say, after finally making the shift due to the price drop to ~$120, I bought 2 pair for my wife and I.... We love them, we use them all the time and can't recommend them highly enough.

My wife jams to the tunes during the day. I keep one in my ear while teleworking for conference calls made easy, and shift to the other airpod when the first one gets low battery. Very seamless, and the sound quality is phenomenal - microphone included!

Waited a good 5 day’s to write a review as I wanted to give them an honest chance. After being told these are the best and researching a good month. I will say the sound quality isn’t bad. It’s not the best I’ve heard but for wireless headphones there’s not a static in the background like some of the cheaper models. The double tap feature is a little strange as it takes a bit to find that perfect spot. Also it’s double tap being pause and fast forward I haven’t been able to ge the music to skip forward only pause. So that feature I haven’t used all that much. They do slip a bit in your ears so I recommend buying the ear hooks. I bought them and they work pretty well with them. There’s also silicon options for covers to help the slipping. I’d also recommend a case for the charging case as it’s quite small and kinda slippery. So all in all I think they’re a decent pair of headphones. Just don’t go into the purchase expecting perfection.

review title: Good for convenience but not sound quality
review_body: I like these headphones because of the convenience it provides, especially around the house. It makes cooking while watching videos on my phone super easy. I love making important calls using my AirPods. The only thing that I don’t like is that when I am on the train during my commute, you can’t hear clearly even if the volume is loud (which can damage your ears). So if this is going to be a huge investment for you and sound quality is important, I would say get some beats or other better headphones. I can’t listen to podcasts on the train because you hear the train over the audio.

review title: Broken straight out of the box
review_body: Quite simply the product worked for 5 minutes with only one paired AirPod, went trough all the trouble shooting to reset and sync them again even got a replacement pod to no avail. So it is after trying every step to fix it that I write this review. They suck, they’re unreliable and finicky at best. Yeah the sound quality is great IF they work, I’m bummed at all the high reviews for these because they’re made cheaply and without care or concern for the product. I shouldn’t spend top dollar on a top dollar device for it to act like dollar store headphones. I’m dissatisfied and disappointed at the terrible quality of this worthless product.

I've bought 3 pairs now. The first two were eaten by the dog at different points in time and therefore needed to be replaced. The sound quality is decent, but I don't have anything to compare it to. Each pair has had it's own type of glitchy-ness. The latest pair cuts in and out for no discernible reason. But, reasonably priced considering my dog will likely chew thru them again in the future.

I love my airpods and have been using them for some time now. I've never had an issue until recently where one airpod never seems to charge in the case despite the case being fully charged. I don't know why this happened all of a sudden this past month. Its incredibly frustrating when I put them in and one seems to have charged perfectly and the other one is at 0%. Has anyone else encountered this problem? Other than that, theyve worked great for the past year.

review title: They do not function as advertised
review_body: I bought these I thought as an alternative to more expensive Apple AirPods and was I wrong. I used them solely with my IPad and the sound bounces periodically from one ear to the other losing sound in the other ear. This is an occasional occurrence but annoying enough to be unhappy. When I first tried using them with my Android phone they wouldn’t stay connected and I had to carry my case with me. I don’t recommend buying these. I purchased a warranty with them and my first contact with CS was not fruitful. I will update my review shortly.

review title: Great value on genuine Apple product
review_body: Christmas gift for my daughter- was exactly what she wanted. Opened the case cover and immediately her phone asked to pair with these. Installation could not be any easier. Love that these are genuine Apple products as I can be sure that they will work correctly with the other Apple products that we already own and use daily. I have always found Apple quality and engineering to be exceptional, and service when having an issue to be top-notch. These were a great value.

I love the product and used it regularly... it worked perfectly, however after 3 months I noticed one day that it kept connecting and disconnecting. When it finally worked, music played in only the right airpod. I troubleshooted the issue and reset the airpods, forgot the device and even resetted my phone. It wasn’t an issue with my phone but for some reason the device wasn’t even showing up in Bluetooth devices. I called apple support and they told me to do the same thing I did, in fact there was nothing they could do for me to fix it. It doesn’t connect to any other iphone and would not appear in non apple phones. Do not buy this product without knowing there could be risks. If you happen to have a faulty airpod, even with a warranty, you wont be able to use it ever again. I dont even know what to do with mine. There no physical damage so I dont understand the problem. Please be aware that if your airpods have internal errors, you. Are. Screwed.

review title: Headphones inside were replaced with FAKE airpods
review_body: I am so upset with this purchase. I bought them thinking it was a great deal so something that was in fair condition. When I received the headphones I didn’t open them right away as I was busy planning my daughters birthday. When I finally opened them the airpods wouldn’t connect to my phone for some reason. After extensive research as to why they were f charging or connecting I found out that the AirPods inside the case were switched out and the AirPods were fake which is why I wasn’t holding any charge or connecting to my phone. I was so upset because I lost my money given that the window for return passed and was given an fauly product. Be careful when ordering these headphones and check them as soon as you buy them so you are able to return if needed. So upsetting to received a fake product. Amazon should really check for authenticity upon product returns like this.

Like this so much , got it from black sale for saving 30 bucks. After a simple a tap setup,it’s automatically connected with my iPhone and always on. Anytime when I am on the phone, just easy to put it on one of my ears, it connected immediately , high quality sounds , 2 moods to switch and less noise . It’s fast charging and can be wireless charging. When I busy and battery was out, I got it charged for 15 mins and it can last 3 hours to use.
Recommend these hand free and high quality sounds AirPods !

review title: DON’T BUY if you are walking. They fall out!!!
review_body:
DO NOT BUY...They won’t stay in your ear!!!
Quality of sound and battery life is good. Great when I am just sitting down. TERRIBLE if you WALK!!!
I wore one in my left ear, sitting in the hospital waiting room. After my husband’s surgery, I went to get the car; it had fallen out and I couldn’t find it!!! Less than 2 months old. Still in the 90 day warranty, but I couldn’t return them, because one was missing.

review title: Make the switch. You’ll be glad you did.
review_body: I was a skeptic for so long but the slim profile and ease of use without chords I will never go back to wires. They pair instantly if you’re lazy like me that’s awesome and I can’t really speak to quality. They aren’t going to vibrate your ears with the bass but for podcasts and your average music listener they are perfect. Anyone who is on the phone for work a lot will love these as well. Very fast charging as well. I went from skeptic to advocate for these guys. They are quite expensive so I would only recommend if you use Bluetooth headphones heavily already.

I’m pretty pleased with these AirPods. I wasn’t expecting greatness I just wanted to be able to listen to music while I charged my phone. It works great for what I need it too. It doesn’t work well with non Apple products though so don’t get these if you want to use them for that. At first I had trouble with the right air pod losing battery quicker and disconnecting while in use but that problem went away pretty quick. I like them a lot but it really is just headphones without cords so don’t expect much more.

review title: Best device for hands free in work environments
review_body: I’m not going to lie, I was worried they wouldn’t stay in my ear as well- but Working in the medical field, I don’t have any issues with them falling out. They can have some difficulties with adjusting to just one headphone taken out and listening in the other still, as the headphones think you’re putting them away and you have to reconnect the Bluetooth. Overall though they work great, I can answer phone calls while doing dishes, or talk on the phone while driving and have no worries about accidents!

review title: DOESN'T WORK & THEY WONT LET ME RETURN THEM!!!!!
review_body: I purchased the apple ear pods 32 days ago for my husbands birthday and they don't work! So I contacted amazon to return them. They told me a couldn't because it expired 2 days ago. I told them I couldn't return them during the pandemic and they told me they would NOT make an acceptation. How can I return and item when the WORLD is closed because of a pandemic, seriously!!!! This is crap I deserve my money back!!!! I asked for a supervisor and they told me they were busy!!!!!!

review title: Should’ve done more research on this product
review_body: I liked the sound quality and noise cancellation on this product but as for the battery life on this Air Pods even if it’s an Apple Product, it’s not exactly great what I hoped. I should’ve done extensive research before purchasing an second generation Apple Air Pods especially online but I decided just to keep them. I only use them at home whenever I’m listening to my music on my iPhone or use them when I’m talking with my therapist on the phone.

review title: So good had to buy one for the wife.
review_body:
This is great here’s the run down:
Earbuds last about 4-5 hours nonstop use. Takes about 30min for at least 50-60% charge in the case. The case itself last for days before u need a charge. I think I went a week. Mind you I work 5 days a week 8hours. Sitting at a desk in front of a computer. I have the time to use it lol. Calls are amazing great sound. I have had no issues running with them everyone’s ears are different so if u run and u don’t use the regular iPhone headphones then this is not for u or you may have to get the ear grips. But if your looking for a good wireless headset and willing to spend some cash get these.

Best part about the air pods is that you can wear them and there aren’t any wires to get caught on anything. Also, you can wear them and walk around the house without holding onto your phone or iPad. Finally, the storage is so compact and convenient. So easy to put in your pocket or purse and no tangles when you take them out of the pocket or purse. My son bought them for me for my birthday and I liked it so much I bought them for 2 of my grandchildren.

Very disappointed!! Left earbud quit working 7 days after return date. I contacted the seller. Third party and they transferred me to Apple. After 2 hours on the phone with Apple we now need to schedule an appointment to have them looked at 45 miles away. This is not good costumer service at all. We tried to save a little money on Amazon with this purchase, I guess we should have just got them at an Apple Store.

I had bought a case for them and they fit just PERFECTLY the sound is great and so far i haven’t had any problem!!, you should buy it!!

***update***
My airpods are still working PERFECTLY and I bought one for my boyfriend and they are original as well and my boyfriend loves them!!!

Excelente audífonos!, son originales y traen garantía desde Apple no he tenido problemas algunos funcionan bien con mi iPhone y iPad.

Expected more out of sound quality, gave as a gift and the comments were and I agree, they are blue tooth and no Bose (they were grateful for the gift!!). I can also hear what they are listening to more than I did with the corded ear buds.

Cool features that when you take a bud out it pauses your music so you can listen to what someone is saying. Two people can listen without being connected by a corded earbud. And you can leave one bud in the charging case and listen with the other.

These earpods are very good quality. I purchased them as a gift and they are everything expected. They have great Bluetooth range. Can pair them to a cellphone and use from another room. Although the microphone could be a little stronger, the sound quality is great. I definitely recommend these. I do feel that the price is high. You can find other earbuds cheaper, at least you know these will last and they are good quality.

review title: Best earphone solution I could find
review_body: I am an Android user and NEVER considered these since I thought they only worked with Apple phone. Dumb, I know. I tried 3 different headphones and 1 pair of earbuds (Amazon..horrible) and I was still unsatisfied. My kids use the Airpods and I tried them on my Galaxy S9. WOW. PERFECT, Easy to pair, comfortable, great sound, great battery and I can wear them all day and switch between music and phone calls. Recenlty upgraded to the Samsung S21 Ultra and I think, if possible, the sound is even better.

The only reason I gave in and bought air pods was because I was having issues connecting my Apple devices to other brands. These are hassle free changing between devices. On the downside they are very uncomfortable on the ear took me 2 months to get use to them. Currently having issues with left air pod sometimes won’t connect. Battery life is ok I’ve had cheap ones that last way better.

Apple headphones are the only headphones that fit my ears well and stay put. I run marathons and have used the corded version, but recently switched to these AirPods. Wow, they are awesome! No cord to get tangled on my clothing or messing around with plugging stuff in at the starting line. I wish I had purchased these sooner!

As for battery life, these are new and last me through 5 hours of running. The charging case battery last longer than I had expected (2 weeks on average, but I’m not draining the headphones every time I wear them).

review title: happy at the discounted prime day price
review_body: like all apple products they are so well made and well packaged! I opened them and thought, wow what a cool case. They paired easier than any bluetooth I have ever used. Sound quality is excellent. I can finally disconnect from my phone and listen to my youtube playlist and easily accept incoming calls midstream. I am not sure I understand them fully yet - how to adjust volume? Not sure. I made a call through SIRI. Lovely product at the discounted primeday price. I don't think I would pay full price for them though.

review title: Best Earbuds I’ve ever Owned - beats Bose
review_body:
I am a musician and as such have used a variety of headphones and earbuds. For recording you want a flat response but for pleasure, you want a slightly sweetened sound. I have two pair of Bose earbuds that I really like but I was shocked at how good these AirPods sounded. I heard instruments I’d not heard before. Better stereo separation and great deep but articulated bass.
And they run for hours, handle voice commands perfectly and are great in my office for phone work. And they literally recharge to 100% in 15 minutes
These are the best sonic and overall earbuds I’ve ever owned.

review title: Not a real Apple Earpod---a Chinese knockoff!
review_body:
Amazon publicly states in their website that these airpods are BRAND NEW. When I received mine and paired it with my iPhone, I discovered that "Daniel's Airpod" now showed up in my iPhone's Bluetooth settings. Obviously, Daniel previously bought this set of airpods and named his bluetooth connection. So much for brand new, unopened product! I had so much trouble figuring out how to use the product because the product documentation was so small I had to use a magnifying glass too read it. And the documentation didn't make sense. One side of this really small, folded piece of paper was in English, the other side was Chinese. One section had numbered instructions: 1, 2, 3, 4, 6. Yes! They skipped #5! That is a real Apple product???

I ended up returning this product to Amazon and ordering earpods directly from Apple. What a difference between this and Amazon's product!

Do NOT buy this!

These were cheaper to order on Amazon then ordering from Apple. My daughter loves these and the fact that you can use only one at a time as well. The fact that she has long hair you cant even tell she is wearing them at all. She can bring up Siri and talk on the phone all without having to even touch her phone.

review title: AMAZING IS NOT A GREAT ENOUGH WORD
review_body: If you are leaning towards getting these then DO IT! I was hesitant because of how expensive a pair of wireless headphones are. What made me cave was ordering a "highly reviewed" set of knock off ones that were just horrible and couldnt connect to each other and when they finally did one kept cutting out. So I decided to get the real ones. I was seeing great reviews so I bought them and then it offered me Apple Care+ which I did purchase. Thats when I was getting really nervous because I was seeing all the bad reviews of people getting used ones and scratched ones. I even seen a review where someone said they couldn't connect them and only one worked, which was what I was afraid of. Well I looked on my amazon order after it had shipped and it gave me a serial number. I checked it with apple and it was indeed an apple product. Still a little worried at that point. I got home that day and opened the amazon box and was very happy that it was in a sealed package and very brand new. I was very hopeful since I bought the Apple Care+ there was no way it wasn't legit. I opened the package and flipped the lid open and they connected to my phone within less than 5 seconds and I was on my way. I din't have to charge them at all and they lasted all night til I went to bed. They cancel outside noises out the louder they are. They are very comfortable. The sound quality is amazing. You hear certain songs a little differently(in a better way). You hear parts of the song that weren't all that clear before. Its hard to explain what I mean and you'd have to get them to understand. I was never one to really like Apple. But now I have an iPhone XR, an iPad and now Airpods and I am so happy that I caved in and bought them. If I could give 10 stars I would. GET THESE AIRPODS! And just make sure you are buying from Apple and not a third party. If they offer you an Apple Care+ then it is legit from Apple. Sorry for the long review but you guys have to know!!

Best Christmas gift! Long battery life, great sound on songs and videos but also calls. Love that it pauses my video if it falls out of your ear. My daughter so very happy!!! We’ve owned a few from random Brands from China, which were surprisingly good don’t get me wrong lol but there’s an immediate difference in all ways.

Headphones are great and make chores and gym easier as I don’t get the wire snagged like my other headphones in random things. Battery life is awesome and I’m between uses the charger case makes quick work of charging. I was concerned about running out of batteries because I will have heavy use occasionally, but the case charges the pods quick and the case charges fully in like 10 minutes with them inside. GREAT buy, especially with Prime Day prices. Only issue is they don’t seem to cancel as much noise? Maybe because of some of the tech lime automatically pausing when one comes out kinda thing? Who knows? Also when you get sweaty you have to pay more attention because they slide a little easier but overall an amazing upgrade to my wired ones!

review title: Loved it but battery life dropped tremendously
review_body:
Bought in March for my birthday. I was very excited and happy the first few months. Last two months I noticed that the battery ran very short. As matter of fact I use it much less these days and wonder if it’s genuine APPLE product. Very disappointed as for now. Back in summer I spent lot of time in gardening, listening to music and podcast. Now I only use for few phone calls. I would like the seller to contact me to see if a replacement can be granted. Otherwise I’ll need a new one.
Thank you for listening.

Good sound quality. I can just tap on it to play it but I haven't found a way how to pause it using just a tap. My previous ear-bud gave me difficulty while using it for call and conversations. This one I like it much as no echo issue and able to hear each other quite well with good quality as well. Not all ear-buds fits well in my ear, but and this one too doesn't fit very well for long time, but for short duration it fits well. I am sure the issue must be with my ear, and nothing wrong with this product. It is a good quality ear-bud.

FRAUD!!!! I received one Apple AirPod (left ear) and an off brand (right ear). I knew something wasn’t right when it kept disconnecting from Bluetooth. I usually wear one pod at a time but I put them both in my ear at the same time and noticed that one was longer than the other. See the picture for example. If you’re going to sell off brand headsets, don’t attach the name Apple AirPods to it, to make it seem like it’s legitimate because it’s not. I will never purchase from this seller again.

I didn't want to "pay the price" for authentic airpods and I tried off brands and other types but none are as good as the real thing. I like these better than the 3rd generation because I don't like the "squishy" noise cancellation ear piece because I like to be able to hear alittle bit while I am walking (like cars and dogs approaching). These sound good and the batteries last a long time. Glad I finally bit the bullet and got another pair after losing my first one.

These WERE amazing!! Then out of no where the left microphone stopped working and no one could hear me. Then a few months later the right microphone stopped working and I couldn’t use them to talk to anyone but I could still listen to music. NOW both have completely stopped working and I can’t use them to talk on the phone and I can’t even listen to music on them anymore. ABSOLUTE garbage for 150 bucks!! Buyer beware and look elsewhere.

I always told myself I wouldn't get these because they looked so stupid, but I broke down one day and tried them out...now I'll never go back! They are so easy to connect. I was worried they would fall out of my ear easily but they don't. Great to use when you are at the gym or need to have your hands free without a cord in your way. You can change the settings on the double tap feature for each ear. I wish there were more options (like a triple tap or something else)...most of the time I only have one in so I am limited in what I can do without picking up my phone, but this is a very minor inconvenience.

review title: Don’t buy through Amazon- Go to Apple
review_body: If you have any problems, Apple will walk you through troubleshooting steps, then send you to Apple. Apple fixed but then issued reoccurred and now out of Amazon’s return timeframe. Now having to go back to Apple, but they won’t refund. Just keep having to get issue repaired again until warranty runs out. I love AirPods, but there is virtually no way to get a refund for a defective set, it seems. skip the hassle and purchase them directly from Apple.

Do not buy these. I am not sure if it is because new airpods are out or if this is not through apple directly. My AirPods constantly fail to connect, and at least once a week i will leave both in the charging case only to have one of them be dead when i wake up. Absolutely horrible product and doesnt work more often than it does. Please do not waste your money like I did

review title: If you have small ear holes....
review_body: I have very small ears apparently. I have spent 100's of dollars trying to find a pair of headphones that work for me.. these are still not them. If you have small ear holes these will fall out constantly. So, I honestly hate using these so much... BUT, with all that being said, they are VERY comfortable.. they do not hurt my ears at.. again small ear holes, a lot of headphones start hurting within 30 minutes of wearing them. The sound is REALLY good. The convenience is the only reason I didn't return them. The battery life lasts FOREVER.. I think I have charged them three times since I got them * I don't use them everyday*. They connect really easily too. If you have small ears hard pass but if you have normal ears then these are for you.. The best way to know if they will fit and stay in is to wear the ones the phone came with... exactly the same fit without the mess of a cord.

Very Disappointed with this Apple product. Had it for two years and didn’t think of buying the extended warranty as you’d think with the name of “Apple” it meant American even though made in China. Nope just another Chinese POS product. Thanks Apple for taking my money in me buying this one of a kind worthless junk novelist item. So appreciative. But lived up to the standards of its other products living vicariously through them such as their phones lasting about two years. Criminal.

review title: Refurbished...sold for new at a full retail price
review_body: I purchased this back in October. When I received them I notice a like burned spot inside the case, but because I have very little time to worry about small marked I decided to overlook . Every time I used them no one could hear me on the other end, i was traveling, so I was going to deal this in a later day. When I finally return I contacted Amazon, I was told that was to late and to have apple care deal with the issue, when I called Apple care I discover that not only the serial number was not listed ... no date of manufacturing, and possibly a refurbished item. Now they don’t even turn on! I called amazon and the response was ... too bad go to Apple care. Amazon as changed... i this point I am to believe they selling refurbished item for new... they costumers support is unsupported... they disconnected the call while I was talking.

review title: Great Quality for a fair price
review_body:
Had these air pods for 10 months. Still works great. Just advise that you have to clean these periodically, as it will tend to get dirty very quickly.

These air pods are quite light and very durable which is expected for a product coming from Apple. Sound quality is nice, but there are other air pods out there that may perform better. So far, its status for longevity is still being observed, as I only had it for 10 months. I will keep this post updated if anything changes from this product.

I started teaching my yoga classes via zoom out of necessity. I set up my iPad and everything worked great, except the sound. I had to speak at full volume for anyone to hear me. It was exhausting. Then another teacher recommended these. I was hesitant to spend so much money hoping for a less costly solution. Finally gave these a try and I’m sorry it took so long. I can have my head down in a pose demonstrating and talking and can be heard by everyone. Love them! And I use them for listening to music or movies too. Brilliant product

I got these for a good price on Black Friday - I never used earbuds much because they were uncomfortable and/or didn’t fit right. I’ve been using them every day since they arrived. The sound quality is good ‘nuf for me and I like the fit. I’m a little concerned that some people had problems with them not working after a short time so i will update if that happens. So far so good!

review title: it was a gift to my wife
review_body: reviews say that they are not apple products, that's a lie, they are!!! now with all electronical products that get QC'ed in bulk there is always a chance of product failure, that being said we contacted apple and a free replacement was sent and all is well, the replacement arrived quickly two or three days, but nonetheless quickly, for the value I recommend them, and I recommend the you also by the apple warranty, as it does come in handy, and very easy to use.

If you are not a fan of silicon plugs and have around 100$ to shell out these 2nd gens are nice as crap. Something about how fast they connect and I guess my ears evolved specifically for these as they are comfortable. I don’t regret buying them to any degree.

I never thought I would own a pair of these since I would prefer wired headphones but since I got a new iPhone and it didn’t come with a headphone jack I went ahead and bought this. So far I’ve been impressed with these AirPods because I could be listening to music or a podcast and just have the phone sitting on a table. Battery life is excellent since I don’t use it often but I always charge it when I’m done using them. Overall I’ve been enjoying my AirPods.

Overall I'm impressed with the sound quality. The connectivity works 90% of the time (sometimes only one Earpod connects). Another complains is that there is no external charging light indicator. You have to open the case to confirm that the device is being charged.
