However my biggest complaint is that there is a ridge between the two pieces of molded plastic which has a cutting affect on my ears. My ears literally bleed after wearing them for a week. These are my second Generation 2 Apple EarPods, both have the same problems. For the price, I expect more from Apple.

The airbuds worked great for a few weeks and then the right earbud stopped working completely. I tried everything to get it to work - reconnecting. Called Apple customer service and they said i would need to pay $70 and return the earbud that wasn't working and they would send me a new one. What kind of warranty is that!

These Airpods came in brand new as expected. I got these for my girlfriend since she got me some so I had to return the favor haha. They have an amazing sound quality and they connect to your phone almost right away. It’s a little more difficult for people like me who only use one side most of the time since sometimes they won’t catch that it’s in your ear but they’re still great products.
The charging speed of Airpods is INSANE, you can fully charge them in like 30 minutes. When your Airpods die you can put them in the case and they’ll get charged most of the way in like 10 minutes and they still last a long time before having to charge them.

review title: Cool product, but way overpriced compared to Amazon Echo Buds.
review_body: Overall AirPods are a good product and they do well for what they are intended. Apple’s standard ear bud design (like these) really sucks, and so my wife likes these, but I refuse to use any Apple’s standard bud design devices anymore, because the design sucks so bad and they constantly fall out (AirPods Pro in-ear design is far better, but AirPods Pro are even more of a rip-off than these standard AirPods). My bottom-line recommendation, is if you can live with the heavier and larger Amazon Echo Buds, the latter are a FAR better value for the money, and work just as well as AirPods.

Once I dropped my AirPod at TSA, I turned around 2 seconds later to find the one AirPod and the feature to find my that was ringing stopped though the AirPod wasn’t dead! Since then I haven’t been able to connect my other AirPod all though my AirPod is charged and all! I tried to reset and nothing. So now I need to buy a whole new set! I have insurance, so hopefully I can get it resolved!

review title: My Take: Knockoffs Aren’t Apple AirPods’ for Less $$
review_body: I have only had the AirPods for a few days but for those of you who have wondered if any of the knock offs are comparable to the Apple AirPods, my answer is that at least the one I tried is not. The charging case and earbuds look almost identical to the Apple AirPods, but that’s where the similarities end. The knock-off’s earbuds don’t fit the ear the same way and fall out easily, the connection between the iPhone and the earbuds is spotty, the battery life is not anywhere near what the AirPods offer, and controlling the knockoff is a nightmare. If you’re waffling about spending the money and you really want excellent sound quality and the rest of the differences, spend it. Yes they are priced higher than I wish they were, but the difference is worth it, at least from my perspective.

review title: First disappointed but now I love them
review_body:
1.) First I was disappointed with the fit in my ear. My old Apple wired Earbuds sounded better.
It can be tricky to position them in your ears. I played around with them for a time until I was getting the full spectrum of sound. With my ears the stem of the Airpods have to be at about 45degrees pointing forward.
2.) Many people question if they are 2nd Gen Airpots. Mine are.
If the model number is A2031 or A2032 then they are 2nd Generation. People should go to the Apple website/Airpod support and read everything about the different versions of Airpods and Cases

review title: I was scammed!! NOT NEW AIRPODS!!!!
review_body:
I bought this "NEW" airpods, and NOT ONLY they where used, but they where BROKEN!!
As I got them more than 60 days later than when I bought them, amazon did not return me the money and there was nothing that they could do.
Luckily the airpods are originals, so apple did change both earbuds. But I lost 5 month of warranty and of course the charging case is used, as the airpods were being used since September 2020 by I dont know who and I got them on February 2021.

review title: Did it’s job, didn’t last long.
review_body:
DON’T LET YOUR CHARGING CASE GET TO 0% BATTERY!!!

I have owned these AirPods for a little over a month. During that time, my AirPods where amazing, great sound quality, great battery life, and it doesn’t fall out the ears! It’s way better than the standard earphones that you get with a new iPhone.

The problem occurred when I let my charging case get to 0% battery for the first time, I didn’t think it would do much since I could always charge it. Unfortunately, the charging case was completely unresponsive, it never turned back on despite leaving it charging for more than a day (yes I used different chargers and yes they all worked on my phone). I contacted apple about it and I was offered a $40 replacement for a problem I didn’t ask for... Apple is so greedy lol. Nevertheless the product is solid for the most part, just never let the charging case reach 0%.

review title: Sound is great on these AirPods
review_body: I love them. I’ve been one of those people who never wanted earbuds but i finally decided to try them as they were on sale. I’m so glad i did, i love them. The sound is great, no noise and they last a long time battery-wise. I have tinnitus in my ears so I’m a little hard of hearing but with these i have no problem hearing, somehow it knocks the tinnitus out, wish the hearing aid worked as good!!

I purchased these AirPods for $99. After receiving them and charging them overnight I use them for one hour. the left AirPod lost 50% of its power during that one hour of use. I contacted Apple to see if I could get a warranty replacement. After confirming the serial number several times Apple was not able to confirm the legitimacy of the AirPods. I immediately sent them back to Amazon.
They appear to be legitimate. They look to be brand new the packaging appeared to be new and legitimate. However I got a little gun shy after Apple could not verify the serial number.

I keep losing these because they just wont fit snug. They're not noise cancelling so i hear a bunch of crap.
But if apple keeps making these damn things, i will keep buying. heard they announced a 500$ earpod, just take all my money now
these aren't particulary great headphones, just hip and you gotta "get in with the crowd"

I LOVE the quality of these ear buds. The issue I have is that twice in a week the right one has quit working. I have had these less than a week. I think they arrived on Monday. I had to delete off my phone and then reinstall them to make it work. Then yesterday the right one turned off. I could not get it to come back on. I put them in case and it showed battery was just 3%. I wear them all day but probably did not use them to talk on phone but maybe one time for about 5 min. They do not seem to be holding a charge for very long. That is quite disappointing. They should for sure hold the charge at least the entire day.

I gave sound quality a 4 star because overall that is how I view them. Listening to music, ummm not so optimal but it is bearable but this come from someone that has Bose headphones. But I didn't purchase these for music obviously, so the features it has and the quality of sound for call taking is great!!! It actually what I expected and exceeded expectations which is why i bought the less expensive version only used for taking calls on the go and around the house. Perfect for that plus have almost the same features as the pro, honestly we think too much into headhones when purchasing them, their headphones, very expensive ones but these are used for what? taking calls , reading text being able to be wireless not for anything complicated like operating a computer lol okay ill go now, im just saying. Don't spend the money if your confused on which one to get, get this one it will work just as good as the others with the same features besides transparency and I have that when I choose, its called pause whatever im doing and move on. Hope this helped, be blessed! :)

out of all the buds I have tried, these are really top notch for music, they don't seal your ear, so theirs no ear pressure, the call quality is outstanding. I can hear everything quite clearly on the other end when I call my wife. It was not like that with all the other wireless buds I have tried, including my pair of BeatsX. It's like it's a wired connection. The new H1 chip is really great. That being said, they are not as comfortable as my beatsX, I can wear those all day. These I couldn't wear for more than 20 mins before they started hurting my ears alot. If you have small ears, these may do the same for you and you may need the beatsX style earbuds like me.

I recently upgraded my AirPods - I have a 2017 pair, and I just upgraded to a 2020 pair. It's absolutely worth it!

The battery life is so much better! Also, it reads your texts to you and Siri will even let you text back just by talking to her! These ones are so much better.

Highly recommended - worth the money!

review title: Previously Owned... not new! Mine belonged to Dr. Antonio
review_body:
These are Previously Owned... not new! Mine belonged to Dr. Antonio. In addition, they had scuff marks on the case as well, with a bit of Dr Antonios hand grease or pocket dirt on the case button. Incredibly, they were sealed like a new pair. If you don't want a used pair, avoid these. These work fine, but I did not pay for a used item, or should I say Preowned!

Good point is that Amazon took care of me on this purchase. Thank you Amazon. SHAME on you APPLE STORE!!! Shameful sales practice.

I bought these as a gift. Not used or refurbished, NEW! Upon receiving I noticed the plastic wrap was missing. I opened the box and all appeared to be ok, the wrap around the case was intact, information was there, charge cord there...
When I gave the gift, we opened up to charge and I saw it didn’t look shiny and new- there were scratches! And then from my pictures you can see they are dirty- with someone’s earwax! Ewwwww
I am promptly sending back and will re purchase at a store where I can see they are brand new!
I personally love my air pods and so does my son, but I would not recommend purchasing them unseen....

I have only had these about a week so we will see how they do over time but my first impressions are very positive. I have had two sets of cheaper ear phones that have had horrible battery life and pretty short lives overall so I decided to spend the money on Apple air-pods this time. The battery time is much better and when they do need to be charged the fact that they recharge in their carrying case is a big deal. I've gone a couple of days without having to plug them back in to a power source. Sound quality has been good to this point.

I had two issues with these ear buds (which I eventually returned). First, I do not have an apple phone, and while the ear buds are supposed to work with other devices - and they do - the sound quality is quite poor. the volume level is just so-so at max volume. I was disappointed because the item I wanted them to work with was an Apple product (IPod Nano). I took it to the Apple store near me and the tech person who worked with me agreed. So, if you are buying to work with your Apple phone (which my wife has), they are fine. Other than that and you will be disappointed.

the airpods were super good when i first got them, i got them when the airpod “2.0” came out and i decided to save money and buy these because i didn’t need the wireless charging feature. when i got them they worked flawless, if only they had stayed that way. they started to cut in and out as if i was walking too far away from them when i was still right next to them. i searched far and wide to figure out what was wrong with them but no one seemed to have this problem. i reset them over 100 times pissed off because i had just spent 160 dollars on earbuds that had the durability of paper. keep in mind i didn’t drop them a single time when this had happened. i ignored it and just used one earbud. this became a big problem when i wanted to block out noise when riding the bus etc... the problem with the airpods is that they don’t block out any noise whatsoever so u find urself turing it up to block out the noise but once it gets quiet you realize ur making ur ears want to die from the loud noise, and once i wanted to use two i noticed it got quiet on one earbud and loud in the other. i had heard rumors about them becoming quiet due to wax build up but i made sure my ears stayed clean 24/7. but it happened to me anyways. i searched up how to fix it and i used all the things they told me to do, but nothing worked. so i did the only thing i knew would actually work, i poked out the mesh inside of the airpod where the music comes out. ta da worked like magic, to this day they haven’t become quiet, but they still have the stupid cutting in and out problem. anyways if u buy these and they cut in and out go return them because you have a year warranty and i didn’t notice that so don’t mess up like i did and poke out the mesh in the earbud and void ur warranty.

review title: Apple won't help if u have a problem.
review_body:
let me start with there are 5 people in my house. Which all have apple phone, I pads and air pods. I got my daughter air pods for Christmas 2019. Since the left ear bud stopped working and the case has metal fragments in it. Cleary a defective case. I called customer support and was given 2 options. Take it to a apple store or best buy. All which are closed in PA due to Covid 19. Or pay a refundable deposit of 59.00 for the ear bud and 69.00 for the case. I don't feel like I should have to make that large of a deposit since they were 99.00 new. I asked for a manager. Who also said that is all I can offer you at this point. This burned my
butt, since I have spent a lot of money on Apple products over the years. May I say I my self have switched to Samsung. At this point I'm tempted to switch my entire family too. You can be loyal like a dog. But you will be beat with the news paper for sure. They won't dare go out of there way to help you. I'm so over the BS with the customer service dept

Ordered back in May 2020 charging case isn’t working as of July 2020 so the return window is closed had to go through apple support and they wanted $70 to replace the charging case on top of the $130+ that I had already spent that would make $200. All I needed was what I payed for, which is a working AirPod case the Earbuds still work. So thanks but no thanks. This is the second pair I’ve gone through from the year prior, I feel absolutely cheated out of my money so yes I am leaving a bad review for the faulty product you sold me. Don’t bother at this point trying to make it right.

Great airpods! Low latency, good sound quality. Please put in the dissription that these are GENERATION 2 Airpods so people won't get confused to whether they are getting gen 1 or gen 2 airpods. I had to look up my serial number on the apple site to make sure, and these are generation 2 airpods! not generation 1. So this is truly the latest model! And please don't get confused, these are not Pros, but the latest non pro model (generation 2).

These were alright until they stopped working. Overall, the quick connection and being able to have either the right or left earbud in was great. They work smoothly with the apple software. However, I would not recommend these for runners. I was unable to keep them in my ear when running and was constantly worried about them falling out. After three months of regular use the right earbud stopped working. For something this expensive, they should last much longer. I would recommend getting a cheaper pair from somewhere else. They will work just as well for a fraction of the price.

Clean standard issue although I would prefer easily the jbl club pro and plus for 80 bucks but since I am on ios the software is a pleasant surprise for Siri and calls it’s smoother than I could ever imagine, the fit is a bit good and bad it collects grime easily and you should probably buy a case, but it’s a ok value option for a clean experience if you have an iphone

The battery Apple used for this product is probably the worst in line. After half a year of using the airpods literally only last 2 hrs and I had to alternate …

And after using these for about a year, my friends told me my voice over the phone was choppy and was hard to pick up. I tested a few times and found out it was the mic in the left pod that wasn’t working. When I brought these to the Genius Bar they wouldn’t even try to figure out the issue and refused to fix it, simply told me to “buy a new pair”.

I’ve been using apple products since Apple Shuffle, iPod, and all the way now to MacBooks and airpods, this is the first time that Apple wouldn’t even try to fix their thing! This really pissed me off, I will never recommend anyone to even think about buying their airpods (or pro) simply coz these are bad quality, and the manufacturer will def drop the ball if anything would happen.

These are great headphones, I wear them working out and at work and the sounds is great. They aren't noise cancelling, but I haven't noticed any issues with it at the gym or at work. Sometimes they cut in and out so the connection can be weird, but that may just be my phone, and it's only happened 2-3 times. I recommend airpods to everyone I know. Very convenient to wear and stay in my ears perfectly.

Received the item and the left ear bud didnt work at all. returned the item. getting a replacement and we'll see if this one works.

Update: the replacement pair came in and they work just fine.

Says new but they are used. Someone’s name
Came up when linked to my phone.

I got these for my 11 year old for Christmas. He absolutely loves them. They charge quickly and hold a charge for a while. My son plays basketball and can be rough. They work perfect despite being dropped.

I own many apple products, from phones to iPads to watches to AirPods.
I bought 2nd generation AirPods for my son, at the time they were the latest model.
I have never needed to contact customer service at Apple until now. It was the worst customer experience ever. After seven months, the AirPods were no longer functioning normally. It took 2 1/2 hours on the phone to find out that I needed to spend $150 to get my warranteed product replaced. They promised to reimburse me. But this was not an acceptable solution for me. I had to spend $150 just to mail back the product and get a replacement. Then I was told I would be reimbursed. That price is more than the AirPods are worth today. And I was told I could not speak to anyone higher up. I am severely disappointed in apple’s customer service. And I will rethink any further Apple purchases.

I ordered my husband a set of AirPods. When delivered, the postman did not follow instructions on where to place packages which are posted all over my place. The AirPods were chewed by a dog. I called amazon and they replaced the set quickly sending me a return label for the damaged one. I appreciate their fast customer service and that this we resolved so well. I will continue to order.
As far as the actual AirPods, I don’t know why we have lived so long without them. They’re “smart” switching on when I put them in my ears. They have a long battery life and great sound. Love them.

This is my second time buying these airpods because i lost one of pods last time. But i won’t lie there was a probably with my old pair which i got from the same buyer. Like the fact that the right bud wouldn't charge sometimes or bluetooth just wouldn’t work. Now i’m having the same issue and its not even two weeks in since i got these! Do yourself a favor and get them from the apple store instead. These are fake!

Bought a pair off Amazon, and had a lot of connectivity issues. Took it to genius bar apple and they replaced both headphones and now the right ear is good volume and the left is nearly non-existent.. don't buy into the hype of apple airpods bc its a lot of money for mediocre product and expensive to replace and because its apple. There is high demand for support of products which delays service you need to fix issues

Update since last review, the right airpod has now gone out. Not even a year old and totally worthless. Worst pair of headphones I've ever had.

This is the real deal. I thought it might be a copy but no It is Apple. Thes AirPods are such a convenience. I can keep my phone near the window where receiption is good and use the airpods for phone calls. Love them for a walk. The value of these are great I already owned airpods but lost the right ear peice. Apple would replace one piece for $63 plus shipping. This buy from amazon included both ear peices, charging case, cable for $119.

review title: DO NOT BUY! These are not authentic Apple AirPods
review_body: These replacement AirPods stopped working after a few months with my original charging case. Took them into an Apple store to be looked at and the tech informed me the AirPods were a replica and not actual Apple brand pods. In fact when the tech ran the serial number it came back that the same serial number was registered to 28 other fake AirPods out there as well.

Sound quality is good. I love how smoothly my AirPods synced up with my iPhone straight out of the box and pair immediately when I put them in my ears. There is not really any noise cancellation, but these do t really claim to so I don’t hold that against them. They are surprisingly comfortable to wear. I use them for work because I am on the phone my entire shift. The battery life is about 2 hours when talking on the phone before needing charged. I wish this was longer. Nice thing is I can take one out and have it charging then switch and charge the other, all without interrupting my calls. Really, only complaint is battery life, but I get it. They are small and wireless. Where would they store more energy? I’m sure that will improve with newer versions.

review title: Very comfortable! Noise cancellation is awesome
review_body:
Gave this as a gift and they really enjoyed the how comfortable it fits within their ears. Tested out noice cancellation and that feature works like a charm! They could not hear me speak at all while it was on.

The quality of the sound from the speakers could be better, but it definitely does the job. Battery life is okay lasts about 3-4 hours with music and definitely less with calls. At least you’ll have the charging case to charge it when not in use.

It’s been almost a year since I bought these and they have officially stopped working. They connect to my device, they pair, they hold a charge, but the sound doesn’t transmit. I’ve tried all the fixes...they’ve worked in the past but not anymore. Seriously disappointing. I was planning on upgrading to the next model, but not if this is what happens. When they worked, they worked pretty well, besides not staying in my left ear. That’s why I wanted to upgrade. I’ve gone back to wired headphones. :-/

Bought 3 pair now, one for me. and my 2 teens. I' m hooked!
I use them for international and local US conf calls ALL day long and they are great! While I do forget they are in , after a long time in my ears, my ears get annoyed/sore. I have small ears ...so I would like if there was a small version or cushion.
I've been through a seriously long list of bluetooth headphones for exercise and business, and these are definitely the best to date.

I purchased these initially on the January 31st. I used them maybe twice. By then, the case was completely dead and would not charge. I tried trouble shooting them by holding down the power button to hard reset and nothing worked. Returned them on February 11th and am still waiting on a replacement. I keep having to go in and approve delayed shipments, but I’m about ready to just cancel and order the newer version. This is too much of a hassle for earbuds that don’t even fit in my ear properly.

Bought these because wires are so early 21st century, pleased to say it's a fairly uncompromising product. Easy to use, great audio quality (especially considering their size), and they're surprisingly pleasing from a tactile perspective.

I suspect other products exist that offer better value and can outperform these from a technical perspective, though I think the airpods are worth their price, they feel "complete" from top to bottom.

It's especially pleasing considering how many products these days disappoint in some way or another, though I think these fit the bill of a "premium" product.

First of all, the product title says "Latest Model" but I received the air pods generation 1, which may or may not explain my disappointing observations? I had a lot of expectations for these air pods because they were $140. When I used them for the first time, I was shocked at how cloudy/faded out the audio was! It also has very little to no noise cancellation. How do people settle for this? The battery only lasted me roughly 3 hours and then it had to go back into the charging case. The only pros was that these air pods looked nice, the fit was comfortable-- I wouldn't recommend it unless you just want it for the hype. I've bought cheaper wireless earbuds that sounded much clearer and better and lasted me a few days without charging (7-8 hours of use), I just don't think I got my money's worth with these. My recommendation is to definitely do your research on different types of wireless ear buds and what you want out of them before purchasing air pods right away.

If you're looking for something that will be very loud this might not be it. It has great sound but isn't the loudest product.
They do feel like they are about to fall out when I'm working out every now and then but you can defiantly manage. I Personally cant go on long runs/ or sprint on a track with them in without adjusting them over and over again. Yes they have fallen out while doing sprints.
They are comfortable and the battery life on the case and each Air Pod is great!

review title: Worth every penny, even if it wasn’t $ 40 off!!!
review_body: It was time for new ear buds. My 2 year old horse shoe around your neck LG ones only worked if you kept your phone in your shirt pocket. I didn’t want to spend that much money but so glad I did! They have a thirty foot range inside my house through 2 walls. The sound is as good as my home stereo, and they work completely with my 4-5 year old IPhone SE and my 7 year old IPad. No one makes products like Apple!!!

I have tried three earbuds from Jabra, two from JLAB Icon series and one from Axil. I wish I had tried these first. The sound quality is amazing. They are comfortable to wear and the microphones are great. The only thing they lack is volume control which would be a very nice feature. These may not be the latest and greatest, but they are good enough for me.

I own an android and this is by far the only good product that Apple has. It works nicely with my phone connects quickly and the sound is great 👍 I would recommend this to my friends the only flaw that I see in this is that you can't skip songs on Android at least. But yet again this was meant to work with Apple devices so I'm not complaining. Overall great stuff. For the price it's a bit expensive but if you get it on sale it's well worth it.

review title: Broken AirPods that never worked got charged . Hope you don’t get this
review_body: These AirPods never and I mean never connected to any of our phones. I spent a combination of close to 4 hours on the phone trying to get this resolved. Finally, amazon said I could return them (after we waited for Apple to answer our call for an hour.) overjoyed, we packaged them up and mailed only to find out we lost $30 of what my sixteen year old daughter paid. Restocking fee? They were BROKEN. Amazon- this is shady and so unlike you. My daughter worked super hard to earn her money mowing lawns. You just made her mow four more lawns to rebuy the same headphones. Pretty rotten.
This product broke just out of warranty. Not just one pod...both pods and the charging case have broken with all different issues. Very disappointed and out a lot of money

review title: They are comfortable and the sound is awesome!!!
review_body: OMG, I just got my AirPods! I put them in and WOW!!! The sound is beyond awesome! I’ve had several sets of wireless earphones, but nothing like this! I’ll have to let you know about battery life since I just got them! They were so easy to pair and then your ready to listen! Someone told me what a big difference there would be and that’s why I ordered them! He was so right! I’m going to enjoy these AirPods!!!!
They took a while to come in but they’re the real deal.

I bought these to listen to music, but now I use them for everything. The coolest thing about these, in my opinion is if you lose one or both you can use the find my iPhone app and it will locate it they chirp till you find it, but if you misplace the complete set with the AirPods in the case, it does not work. Which is stupid because that’s how I carry them in my pocket. Anyhow, it’s a great product I wish I would’ve spent a few more dollars and bought the wireless case. And they are waterproof, I did wash them in the case at the laundry mat on heavy soil. Cudos

I love them they sound great work great look great good deal I only needed the 1st gen I understand the 2nd gen is a little more upgraded but who needs it? All I wanted was the AirPods I had no head phones so I decided why not I bought some little ear covers so they stayed in my ear which was a perfect decision cause now they don’t fall out cause one of my ears would fall out cause not all ears are equal lol. I would buy if you want to splurge!

I like how easy to use they are, how good is the sound. I like the little charging box. I have not found a way to control the volume without invoking Siri. The battery is reasonably durable but I wish it lasted one full day. Seems to be shorter than a cell phone one.

review title: Don’t buy, no somution from Apple
review_body:
Worst bluetooth ever.

After a month use, right earpiece is fading out. When I make a call, the part on the other side barely hears. Many of this cases were reported to Apple(according to apple support community), but Apple doesn’t even have any solution for a long time. This happens to Airpod and Airpod Pro.

But my left part earpiece keep falling out and I can’t even make a call with this bad designed product.

My old $20 Bluetooth or my son’s Galaxy buds works much better than this airpod.

review title: First pair lasted 2 weeks, hopeful for second.
review_body: First pair stopped working (wouldn’t connect to devices and right AirPod’s sound would go in and out) after 2 weeks. Amazon tech support tried to troubleshoot several times but finally they requested that I exchange. Sent out a new pair that was delivered the next day and UPS picked up the old pair. Will provide update on new pair, hopefully they will last.

review title: He loves his Apple Air Pods.
review_body: Gift for my grandson. He was thrilled to get them. I also have a pair & that's the reason I bought him a set too. The quality of the product overall is good. The sound outside & noise canceling of cars going by is wonderful but you can still tell what's going on around you for safety purposes which was important to me. They are not waterproof so when walking in the rain I use the hood on my rain jacket to keep them dry. He said hid was the best gift!

review title: Order filled with third party refurbished parts
review_body:
Within 3 months of purchasing this product, I noticed the headphones did not consistently charge in the case. It was very finicky and would lead the the airpods being dead half the time I would reach for them. Ultimately, I took them to the Apple Store, who then sent them off to be fixed/replaced. However, the techs at Apple noticed the serial numbers did not match between the case and the headphones and thus could not be fixed, indicating they were used parts that someone had repackaged as new and sold to me pretending they were a new set. Because they were broken and mismatched and apparently bought via a third party and not from Apple via Amazon as I had thought, I was not able to get the product fixed by Apple themselves and instead I have broken AirPods.

Oh and the warranty associated with the serial number on the case expired 4 months earlier than when I purchased them, so I was out of luck there as well.

I purchased these airpods in November. A few months later, the left airpod stopped working. I brought this to an Apple Store for repair. The gentleman at the Genius Bar said that based on the serial number, this airpod had already been "replaced" in the past, and could therefore not be fixed. He was nice enough to send in a request to have this error fixed, but, I will need to wait about a week until it can be replaced despite being well into the 1 year warrenty. Massive inconvenience. I am so disappointed Apple didn't do anything to remedy faster.

I got these as a gift, and I was worried about purchasing these online, and when they arrived they were exactly what you’d get in store but cheaper! They work really well, easy to connect, you adjust the settings for them in the blue tooth menu on your iPhone. And they stay charged for a long time as well and came with a iPhone charger. I recommend these if you’re able to not lose them as they can be lost very easily. They do make cords to attach to them so you can wear them around your neck. But other then that, I have zero complaints about these AirPods. I’m very happy I decided to purchase these through amazon.

review title: Amazon sold me a used product
review_body: This was a used/refurbished product. After 2 weeks of using them, people could no longer hear me when on the phone. The audio quality made me sound like I was underwater. I purchased these for work and could no longer use them. I took them to apple and they cleaned them and the problem was still there. Apple notified me that this was a refurbished product that was returned to amazon before I bought them. Amazon should really notify a customer that the product is not new so things like this do not happen.

review title: I love these Gen 1 airpods so much!
review_body:
I had borrowed a friend's old AirPods gen 1 for about 3 weeks until I had to give them back. After one week without AirPods filled with relentless struggle using cheaper wireless earbuds, I realized I had to buy my own pair! That one week was torture!

I can't tell you how happy I am to be using these AirPods again! The design is sleek, slender and pocket-friendly. The wireless connection is superb between my iPhone and MacBook. Plus- if a friend also has airpods, you can "bump" your sound and listen to the same song, podcast or tv show coming from one apple device.

A few things to note: these are NOT the wireless charging (gen 2) airports. They come with a lightning cable but NOT a charging block.

I love these very much. I owned a pair of Bluetooth earbuds prior to getting AirPods and I didn’t like them very much because they didn’t stay in my ears and the battery didn’t last very long. The battery life of these AirPods last for a long time in comparison on a single charge. They stay connected without difficulty to my iPhone and I couldn’t ask for a better pair of earbuds. I’m glad I got these for myself. The sound quality is 10/10 and the noise cancellation is amazing, the best I’ve ever had to be honest.

The only reason I gave it four stars is because its price is not as good as it is on Black Friday. I remember only selling 109 at that time! Of course, the price of amazon is now better than best buy and target!

The sound quality is definitely not comparable to beat, but I think it's not bad! Used to answer the phone, watching TV is already very good!

I charged the case and ear buds when they arrived even though they were over 80%. I used the ear buds for the next six days on my walk. (1hr & 35min) I put them in the charging case when I returned. I just checked the ear buds and they are fully charged again. I'm not sure when I will need to charge the case again. I love this product. (I had to return a cheaper set of ear buds before I bought the Apple Ear Buds. You get what you pay for most times.)

I 10/10 recommend buying AirPods but know that you’ll never be able to ever switch to anything else. I bought my first pair of AirPods three years ago and have been happy with them ever since. I have also occasionally bought them as gifts for friends/family. The battery life is amazing. I use them a lot for work usually listening to music which last me about 7 hours before the 10% warning sign letting you know to charge them. The AirPod case will usually last me about two days before I need to charge it again. Also you can track them if lost (iPhone users) on the find my phone app. It’ll even allow you to play a sound so it’ll be easier to find. I just don’t see myself ever buying anything but AirPods ever again. Also I recommend you buy a case for it so it could stay protected and it’s easy access for me since I always attach them on my belt loop. I truly have never been so sure about recommending something other than AirPods.

my AirPods were delivered today, I ordered them on Black Friday. I read all the reviews to make sure that I wouldn’t be scammed, and although the product had several bad reviews, I ordered them anyways since I really wanted AirPods and they were sold out everywhere else. The AirPods came in their original packaging, with everything new and intact. They weren’t used, dirty, or damaged. Also, a lot of people are saying that amazon is selling first gen AirPods and saying that they’re second gen, but these are second generation AirPods!! I checked the serial numbers and I’ll attach a picture too. The reason why there’s no light on the front is because the charging case isn’t a wireless charging case, and it doesn’t say that it comes with one anyways. The sound quality is fantastic!! I really love these, they are real Apple AirPods and I suggest buying. If I have any issues, I’ll update, but so far so good!!

So I'm not an Apple user at all but these were highly recommended for me to use with my Galaxy Note S10+. The sound is absolutely amazing! I could hear artists talking during songs that I've never once heard using my phone with or without headphones, Bluetooth in the car or TV sound bar! I'm very impressed. A pretty long range for the Bluetooth too. Moved further away from my phone in the house than previously could with phone from soundbar with no sound interruptions.
Sound great. But they should for the price. Difficult to fit in and keep in ears.

review title: Where have you been all my life?
review_body:
For some time, I thought that AirPods were a silly luxury. Was I wrong! Set up was a breeze, sound quality is excellent. Texting - my least favorite things to do - is so easy with Siri. Auto correct for manual texting is a pain, but Siri dictation works beautifully.
I am a woman who isn't very technically savvy. I run a business and often need to multi task. With air pods I can free up my hands , walk both my dogs while answering phone calls and texts, ask Siri to find a news channel, etc, etc
I am very happy with this purchase!!

Bought the first generation and two months in the left earpiece would go dead twice as fast as the right, by one year the left earpiece no longer worked at all, the set i bought my daughter also was dead by one year. Bought the gen 2 set to replace them hoping things were better and the right earpiece doesn’t fit the case properly, if i don’t hold it down into the case it wont charge. Called apple and they were as unhelpful as they were in the past, send us the product you just bought and after a while we’ll send it back and say its within specifications. I guess im the idiot for repeating the same mistake. Im sure they won’t miss me but im done with apple.

Honestly the bad reviews are either people who bought from a 3rd party or are too broke that they are switching their used pods for new ones. These are great! Honestly I went for the 2nd gen because I had them before (but I forgot one in my pocket..and that went in the wash) but liked how they sound. I also like how they feel in my ear compared to any headphones with the ear rubber pieces, those fall out so easily.. I was too scared to get the 3rd gen because they look different ear wise and then wouldn't know if I could return it cause it wouldve been opened plus I prefer not to spend more than what I spent on these lol!

I have an different brand that I listen to music when I walk. They were my husbands and he didn’t like them, so I used them and like them. He got air pods and said huge difference. I kept them off brand ones all summer and just last week got the second generation air pods and omg husband isn’t wrong…..huge difference in the sound quality!! Love love them

My son thought this would be a great deal for me since I use corded headphones frequently, and Amazon had them on a daily special. My problem is that they fall out of my ears and I’m afraid I’ll lose one, so I no longer wear them outside or away from homy. Batteries give a warning when they’re about to die. I let both run down before recharging so the charge in each will be even. Otherwise, one might be at 20% and the other completely dead.

review title: They work well, but sound quality not that great.
review_body: I really do like my AirPods. That being said for the price of these things you would really expect better sound quality as well as noise cancellation. The battery life is excellent but overall I have to say I would like a higher quality sound with ear plugs. I use these while riding my motorcycle and have to put them upside down and in opposite years in order to not lose them while I’m riding down the road Not the best use for motorcycle cruising, but work okay otherwise, just not great sound.

Hey there,

I purchased these "New" Airpods and when I connected them they were already registered as Akki's Airpods. Addititonally, the left Airpod does not work. Complete scam. I will be returning them promptly.

The only earbud to last the promised playtime and no of charges from the case.

All other earbuds do not even come close to meeting their promised spec.

Looks pricey but I feel the one time ~100$ investment on this ear bud is better experience compared to the cheaper <50$ versions which you will end up replacing after warranty expires. Typically the cheaper products are designed to work till their warranty period with the occasional good one. I recommend this unless you are feeling lucky.

I have an Android, but Airpods are better than other truely-wireless earbuds, plus airpods are the only earbuds with cases you can add that are cool and cute. I absolutely love them and have had no issues other than the fact that they loose connection for a split second, but I figured its because I dont actually have them connected to another Apple product. And as for background noise, I can still hear everything happening around me unless I obviously have the volume all the way up.

I was reluctant to move from corded earbuds to these but must admit they are great. Worried they'd fall out of my ears-they don't. worried they would drain my battery fast and die quickly-so far they haven't. I know I am a late bloomer on these-but glad to finally join the rest of you and be cord free.

After owning a pair of AirPods myself for a long while I bought two pairs for my teens. They BOTH love them! Super easy to use and the great quality that you would expect from Apple. My kids are so happy they no longer have to worry about the cords. Sound quality is fabulous and they stay in their ears when they workout. I thought about buying the cheaper brand until I heard of how they stop working so I'm glad that I went ahead and bought quality... it shows. I bought silicon covers for the cases with clips as well. Super fast delivery!!!!

These are 100% legit Gen 2 AirPods. For all the people saying the charging indicator light should be on the outside of the case for Gen 2 cases, I bought a pair of G2 AirPods from Verizon and they’re IDENTICAL. From everything I’ve seen, the Gen 2 cases with the charging indicator light on the outside are the WIRELESS charging cases. I looked up the model numbers (A2032 A2031 each AirPod) (A1602 charging case) all say Gen 2.

Easy to use, most of the time. Works with ALL my devices. Easier to use with Apple products. Battery life is no problem. Sound is good. Fit is good. No opinion on noise cancellation - headphones are better. It was more than I wanted to pay for wireless earpods/buds, whatever, but you get what you pay for. If they last, it will be worth the money. Easy to lose.
Two months later: lost an ear pod while walking on a grass field. Fortunately some kind soul found it in the park where I was walking and placed it on a park bench. Like looking for a needle in a haystack. It still works but as I said, they’re easy to lose.

So I originally bought some generic pods...that sucked because the battery life was all of maybe 6 hrs, no charging case. So I returned them and sprung for the real airpods. I have not regretted it. The battery life is amazing. My right ear tends to hurt slightly having the pod in but not such an issue with a plastic cover on it. The connectivity and setup is AMAZINGLY easy. I have two Iphones and the airpods connect effortlessly. I recommend these airpods
Hasta ahora me siento bien con ellos, me gusta pra trabajar y puedo escuchar todo el entorno k me rodea

These air pods are maybe great for young people. The battery only seem to last 2 or 3 hours, which is unreal to me. Kept falling out of my ear, lucky I haven’t lost one. Don’t notify you have a call, so you have to keep the phone out to answer it. Another problem. I would return them if I could. Will check to see if there is a time limit. I miss my old ones so bad. I recently changed over to all Apple products in December 2019. I love my phone though. I will look for other alternatives for these . Bought accessories & other pieces trying to make these work. No luck!!!

I love my AirPods. This older model requires a lightning wire connection to recharge, but works great. (Newer versions can charge on a charging pad). I use one bud at a time and alternate ears, recharging the unused, one so they can be used all day, then recharge the case overnight. The case can recharge the buds in 15 minutes several times before needing to be recharged itself. If I could only remember where I left the case....

review title: A definite must for any road warrior!
review_body: I love my Apple iPods! The charge last for at least two days it seems. I had a 5 1/2 hour flight and had music playing the entire flight and they never died unlike my previous Beats Wireless headphones that died after 3 hours. The sound quality is perfect and when I’m on conference calls everyone on the call can hear me perfectly without any background noise or static. I definitely recommend these for any working professional like myself, that travels extensively for work and has to attend multiple conferences calls everyday, many of which I am having to give a presentation to prospective clients or my team.

review title: Already Synced to someone else's phone
review_body: Appears to be a genuine product. However; when installed already had someone else's name pop up when I synced the EarPods to my phone. I expected to purchase a NEW product. Nothing in the ad suggests otherwise. This is not cool.

I finally broke down and bought myself some! I love the way they fit securely in my ears. I’m another person who has small ears, and some buds just won’t fit/stay in! Or maybe WE have perfect ears and the buds are made wrong! They hold a charge for many many hours of use. My only issue is getting them out of the cute little case...I seem to drop one every time, but that’s no biggie. I wish there were a little ring on the case, like some of the storage cases. I highly recommend!

I have small ear canals and worried about comfort but these are the best I've ever used. I love the sound and usually if I'm going to be outside and need to hear other things happening, I just use one at a time and it works great. The connection between them and my phone is great, and I can be long distances from my phone or leave the phone in the house and they still work.

review title: Stopped working in less than a year.
review_body: I feel like we have to replace and buy a new set every 2-4 months. I rely heavily on using the AirPods having to be on the phone a lot. Suddenly people on the other end of the line are not hearing me well or claim that I have a bad connection, even though reception is clear. When switching to phone, everything is fine. I have done numerous tries to troubleshoot with no luck.

I ordered these based on the reviews. The sound quality is amazing. I already have an Apple phone, so perfect fit. This model is really comfortable for my ears. I know a lot of people prefer the smaller ear buds, but I don’t have a problem with this design. Phone calls come through perfect too. I would definitely recommend. Easy to charge, absolutely love these:)

These little Airpods are great! I had done extensive research before getting these and had seen a lot of hate online towards these earbuds by many tech reviewers. I’m not a audiophile, but I think these have awesome sound quality. Plus, they work great with an iPhone with the instant pairing! Are they expensive? Sure. Don’t fit in everyone’s ears? True. But they are worth it in my opinion! Better yet, get them on sale during Black Friday/Cyber Monday! They were $99.99 for the 2020 holiday season.

review title: I couldn’t be more disappointed. Only worked for less than two months.
review_body: These are are wonderful sounding but sadly the right air pod quit working after 2 months. I have talked to Amazon customer service three times and they have been wonderful. We have done all the “trouble shooting “ tips and have been able to get them working. But the next day the right side is again not working. This is my second set of air pods. I had the first generation but the microphone went out after 6 months so no one could hear me when I would talk a call. I waited for the 2 nd generation and finally got a pair delivered on July 7 . It’s September 10 and after three tries with Amazon customer service I will be calling Apple. I’m not hopeful and don’t recommend. I only use these when walking outside so it’s not like they are getting a lot of rough, sweaty use.

This is definitely brand new AirPods. Unfortunately, I lost my AirPods yesterday. Guess someone already took it. I really like this product. However, it is way easy to lose it. I’m very frustrated since I purchased this last month, Except high risk of losing it.

The price just dropped $30. What a bummer !!!!! I’m a broke student who saved up money for this product. I can’t believe that I overpaid it again !!!! First is my refurbished printer. Now it’s the AirPods. Can I still trust Amazon ? Dumbest purchase ever!!

By now I'm sure everyone knows these Apple airpods. The only thing I wish they'd do is curb out background noise for construction people. My husband is a locksmith and frequently is cutting things in the background. If he's on his and I'm on mine and he cuts a key, I sometimes jump a little at the pain coming into my eardrums. Other than that, for people who don't make loud noise all day, they're obviously very convenient and comfortable.

review title: Great; IF you are an iPhone owner and you are not sharing them with some other person in your life.
review_body:
Pros:
Great sound and mic quality! (not a music person, talking about calls)
Put it on and start listening; very easy to use.
Cons:
When you need to share it with someone (OK, for some this might sound gross for an in-ear device, but my wife and I came to terms with it, lol); the whole second point above is gone. You need to go to bluetooth menu etc like any other headphone.
For non-iPhone, the whole ease-of-use is probably not there.
The touch actions on the earpieces are not very flexible. There are some good actions like Previous track, next track, Siri, etc. but I wanted things like Pause call, Unmute mic.. the things that might come in handy at a conference call. That is not there for AirPods.. at least until Apple wants to bring it to the next iOS

When this product arrived there was a buzzing sound in the right earpod. Upon contacting Amazon about the issue they put us in contact with Apple and we have had to ship the product back to Apple for evaluation. We ordered the refurbished product with the belief that it would be functional. It was not.
Overall the customer service was great from Amazon, but I am now leery of purchasing refurbished again.

I recently got an iPhone 12 mini and caved in and bought these. Yes they're pricey but worth it IMO.
Very easy to use and so convenient. The sound is better than I expected! I like that you can feel the bass well. Sometimes they do slip out but you have to try out which way works best for you/your ears.

review title: Battery life is horrible (sending them back)
review_body: I can honestly say this was a bad investment. I wanted them so that I can talk on the phone with them in but they continue to disappoint. The battery life is horrible. The left never has as much charge as the right and so I walk around with one AirPod in. The sound quality is so so. Not the best I heard from my other wireless headphones. I’m really disappointed at the price because I feel like these are cheap products that Apple made and tried to pass off as worth your money when they aren’t. They’re worst quality than wireless headphones that cost half the amount they do. Overall, don’t buy these.

The main appeal for me was that the Apple earphone design was actually better fitting for my smaller ears. Silicone tips genuinely bothered me enough that I switched and I'm glad for it. These do work for general sound quality. Honestly the extra mobility I get while I work is what makes these amazing, and the easy connectivity to my phone and laptop!

This is my first set of AirPods. I got them so I would be able to listen to music and podcasts while doing other tasks and charging my phone. So far, so good. The sound quality sounds great. Next time I’ll get the wireless because constantly having to charge another device is a bit much. Also I notice that it’s easy to lose AirPods around the house and the Find Me app on iPhone has not been helpful in finding them. Otherwise I think this is a good buy.

I’ve had these things for about a year now and they have been used almost everyday. I was really skeptical when I first got these and I thought they were fake, they weren’t, and a lot of people say that they’re fake which threw me off but they’re real. The battery life is good although the left one dies faster then the right, but what can you say when you use these all day everyday. As far as the sound goes, it’s good, not 500 dollar stereo overear headphones but it’s good.

review title: Not even in the same ballpark as the others!
review_body: Like any other Apple product, these AirPods are amazing. Easy to connect to your iPhone, super intuitive to use, great range (distance from your phone), the sound quality is great, small in size. The fact that you can recharge them directly from the case is another great plus. When you're not using them, just place them back in the case and they recharge on their own! I was so happy with this purchase, that I bought another set for my husband and one for my daughter. Highly recommends!

I had purchased a cheaper pair that I found online. They turned off unexpectedly, the battery ran down quickly you never know when they were going to work. So I got tired of the problems and ordered these Apple AirPods with Charging Case. I just love them. I have had no problems of any kind. They have work beautifully from day one. I wish I had not wasted my $50 on those other ones and just bought these the first time. They have great battery life!

review title: 5 weeks and then don’t work no help from Amazon
review_body: Total junk. After 5 weeks of used they stopped working. I called for support and was not provided any assistance from Amazon services who sold them. What a waste of 150 for 5 weeks. Beware of buying simrkg g that Amazon will not stand behind.

review title: Best headphone I have ever used
review_body: I had doubt on the $150 price for this Apple AirPods when it came out because it's so hard to justify the cost. I've had several wireless headphones before the AirPods, notably Motorola M9 and M10, and some other generic brands. None of them is truly wireless when compared to the AirPods. Most importantly, the AirPods feels comfortable when I wear it for a long time. This is is one major reason I bought this because the AirPods Pro, though incredible for it's noise canceling, is not suitable for long-time wearing. The battery of my older first generation AirPods is not good anymore, so I got this newer generation for $99 when it's on sale. I think it's a great deal and a must buy.

I was super against hopping on the AirPod bandwagon for a while I will admit. But these were on sale and I was on an online shopping spree and said why not. And I am so so so glad I bought them and so sad I waited so long to buy them. Great audio and noise cancelling. They stay in amazingly. I’ve worked out and had a bedroom dance party to test them and they stay in and sound is great the whole time.

review title: Buena calidad pero Inconforme por cargo adicional a mi cuenta
review_body: El producto lo considero de buena calidad como es costumbre en los productos de Apple, pero me desagradó q después de haber pagado y recibido el producto, encuentro un cargo adicional en la cuenta con la q realicé el pago procedente de Amazon (sin explicaciones), cargo q no sé de donde se originó y mucho menos comprendo cómo Amazon pudo entrar a mi cuenta y hacer un cargo sin mi autorización. Lo considero una falta de respeto y un atrevimiento mayor. (Lo único q puedo pensar al buscar una justificación es q sea por motivos de tazas de cambio entre monedas, y es q aún así la conversión la hace su sistema automáticamente, así q sigo sin comprender la razón del cargo adicional a mi cuenta incluso después de pagado y recibido el producto) Cuento con evidencias desde q hice el pedido, el valor al cual valoraron el dollar, y del cargo mencionado.

These came clearly used. Somebody else’s name already assigned to them, ear wax in both headphones (yuck), and a case that rattles.

Pretty lame to sell used stuff as new.

review title: Incredible product with a fair price
review_body: I never thought I’d own a pair of these, but after my corded Apple earphones got ripped out while working out 4-5 times, I said enough is enough and bought these. I’m so glad I did! The sound quality it great, they don’t hurt my ears, and they never fall out. Not to mention the Siri function is extremely useful when working out! I still think they’re a tad bit expensive for what they are, but that’s Apple for you.

I live for these AirPods. They’re so sickening and make me feel like a bad binch whenever I walk into Walmart cause then I look around at everyone else that’s AirPod-less I’m like “hmm.. smells like broke in here” and I strut down those aisles living my rich woman fantasy even though nobody is looking at me. These AirPods make me feel like all eyes are on me baby. I am a Leo tho, so maybe that explains things. Anyways, the only reason I’m able to live my fantasy is because of these AirPods so I definitely recommend dropping that coin sis. I even got my cister a pair too so she can strut down her college hallways and live her own bad binch fantasy. AirPods are life changing, like honestly. So yeah, get some.

SCAM!!!!! These were not new. Not even close. They were originally bought 1,457 days ago. Found this out when I had to call Apple support because when I received them the left side never worked. They said to fix them would be $145 because they were out of warranty…. That’s how I found out how very old they truly were. I’m LIVID. So much for that Christmas present for my son

review title: Headphones that work for all activities!
review_body: Very happy with these headphones. For years I have been buying either knock off blue tooth headphones that either do not fit in my ears (they are small), stay in place during activity (such as running) and or are not compatable with my iphone. It is quite expensive, however worth it for wireless headphones that actually work for all of the above issues I had with previous headphones. The only downside is that occasionally the headphones are slow or delayed to react to a song change (with the double tap) or will fall out easily if I hit them accidentally. Otherwise they do stay in place well, I am just an accident prone person. The case is also nice so I do not loose them (as this is often a problem for me, lol). I definitely recommend spending the extra $$ for these if you have an iphone.

these are my first Bluetooth earbuds, I was kind of late to the party (and still am since I'm getting the wired case ones). Honestly, no regrets. I'm so happy that I can just walk around my small apartment with my podcasts or music playing. It's also super nice without any wires anywhere when I need to use them in public. The audio is really great for me, almost too good. The first few days I had it, I would listen to lectures and I could pick up sounds that made me think someone was near me and it would freak me out lol

I love these AirPods. I ended up getting a pair of Pros after because they didn’t fit my ears, but I was still very impressed with these.

Pros (ha): Call quality is crystal clear. Range is excellent- I could hear my calls from the basement all the way to the 2nd floor. They snap in the case perfectly, and the case is tiny and fits easily in my pocket. Sound quality is good.

Cons: Bad fit - not good for small ear canals like mine. Ambient sounds can be a bit loud (didn’t expect noise cancellation, though). Stems are long and awkward looking, and therefore easier to knock out.

Great except the Left one falls out. Fell out getting into my car. Fell out multiple times as I ate dinner. I really wanted to like these but if I’m always afraid one will just fall out then what good are they?

LOVE THEM

Everything about them pair so well with my iPhone! Sound quality is through the roof and the noise cancellation is one thing that will come in handy on the busy roads. The battery life lasts so long too. They came very secure so they weren’t damaged and everything was in place. Love it!

review title: that he could hear with these
review_body:
I bought these for xmas but decided to let him try them to make sure they were okay, they were not
one of them was bad I had to make an appointment at apple and go in they have to replace the
bad one it might be good for the shipper to check these out before shipping after they wer
fixed he loved them it was inconvenient to have to go to apple

After using the airpods for a week or so, I am not thrilled and for this price, I expect better. Although the design is beautiful, it is hard to get them in your ears, even harder is keeping them in your ears! I bought them to use on the treadmill and listen to my ipad while cooking. Exercising with them is frustrating, with the sweaty moisture that goes with exercise, the airpods fall out of your ears and I am going back to the traditional ear buds.

I have been wanting a pair of AirPods for a minute but I just didn’t have the funds to get them, so I saved up some money and FINALLY got them. But of course, I wanted to check if there was a cheaper and easier way to buy them as the closest Apple store is an hour away from me and lo and behold I saw these beauties for $30 cheaper than they are on the Apple store. I waited a dreadfully long 3 days for them to come and oh my god, I was on top of the moon when I saw they were delivered. Now before I ordered them I was very skeptical as some people were saying they were fakes and they broke on them as soon as they opened their Airpods. I don’t know what their reviews were about lol, but mines are brand new. Sealed and brand new package with brand new Airpods. Connecting them was a breeze and the sound quality is much better compared to the regular ear pods Apple has that comes with the phones. I’m in love and I am here to assure you, even though my review will probably get lost in the mix, that these are the real things and I am very satisfied with my purchase!

Ok, this is my second review after Amazon deleted my first one. In their email they claimed it was authentic and it was not fake! If it was authentic why Apple website didn’t recognize it when I entered the S/N to verify its authenticity?!

The sound quality is good. But the battery life and the charging capability is absolutely amazing. They are just perfect. No wires bothering you, they stay in good. Someone ask you a question you take one out it pauses the music. Take them out put them in the case and in 15 minutes you have fresh head phones. I haven’t charged the case in over a week and I’m still going strong. The way they are engineered is truly amazing.

Great sound in a tiny comfortable size. To get any better sound quality you would have to go to full size Bose or Beats. I am a musician and truly appreciate the sound quality given the convenience of size and price point. The noise cancellation is not the quality of large headphones but in every other sense, these are great. Also great ease of BT connection; just put them in your ears and they connect, no buttons needed. Great mic for phone calls and the battery life is amazing! I use them for hours, just plug case in at night and pods stay charged at all times.

Sound is excellent for listening to music, watching shows online, and talking on the phone. I think the mic is very good, too. But I had these on for an hour and had to remove them twice because they hurt my ears. I want to return them and get the pros, which my husband has; the pro are much more comfortable — and they have noise cancellation. But they’re almost double the price. :(

I bought these because I had trouble keeping similar wireless headphones in my ears while walking or exercising. Other wired or wireless headsets with interchangeable, difference sized soft ear pieces never fit right and had a tendency to come loose or slip out entirely. Very annoying at the gym in the middle of a class or on the treadmill. These are so light and hang on the ear that you don't notice they are there.

Frankly I don't use them on an 'i' device but on an Android phone. That shouldn't matter. The only negative is that every once in a while they seem to go out of sync. This causes an echo effect. It becomes difficult to understand spoken word because of the echo. The only way I have found to fix it is to go to Bluetooth settings, disconnect, then reconnect the AirPoids. That means I have to stop my exercise program to restart them. Very annoying. The connected device used shouldn't matter if the Bluetooth is compatible.

I initially bought Samsung earbuds because they were highest rated. I found them to be uncomfortable and more expensive, so I returned them and purchased the earbuds. They work well, except sometimes people say they cannot hear me. I like the fit, and the convenience of not having any wires. They’re the most comfortable earbuds I’ve ever had.

These AirPods arrived in perfect condition. New, sealed box with instructions, charging cable, charging case, and of course, the AirPods! I don’t know why the other reviews are a mixed bag of poor to terrible so far as the product is concerned. You can tell from my pictures that there is absolutely nothing wrong with them. I don’t think these are intended for noise canceling, so I rated them a 3 in that area. Otherwise, 5 stars! The AirPods and charging case arrived more than 75% charged, too. Ready to go right out of the box. Love them!

These airpods are 1st generation. It’s obvious as soon as you open the box. The light that indicates if it’s charging is on the inside of the case rather than on the outside of the case. I’m very disappointed but I’ve already opened it so I don’t think I can return them. If you’re looking for Apple products just go directly to the Apple site

review title: User Friendly and helpful, this is why I bought them
review_body:
AirPods came as expected, nothing unusual. If you’re trying to decide if you need to get the wireless case, I would say just go for the wired case. It charges so fast it isn’t even a problem. When your AirPods die, the case has charge in it as well, so in a way, it is like having wireless charging. As long as the case is charged, you can put your AirPods in without having to plug into the wall and it charges.

These AirPods don’t fit in my ears like the apple ear pods. They’re a little looser and don’t go as far into my ears, I’ve noticed. I’ve gotten use to it and I just turn the volume up a little.

The best thing about these headphones isn’t the sound quality. For me it’s just the user experience. It automatically connects to the apple device I’m using and the battery percentage shows. Pop an AirPod out and whatever you’re watching or listening to pauses. Can tap on the AirPod to answer a call. I bought them for convenience.

Got these as a Christmas gift for my wife. She has recently started using an exercise bike and with the new Apple Health + option, I got these so that she could listen to the workouts while riding in comfort. The noise cancellation on these is really good as well, doesn't block out all noise, but you can melt away while using them. She has used them almost daily since she got them for Christmas and is in love with them.

Just received my new pair. I had a pair of AirPods but unfortunately left them in my pants pocket..and they went through a wash cycle. So I went on amazon to see about buying a new pair. My old pair was free (since I got a new iPad through Apple) but this pair was $136 with tax. I was definitely hesitant to buy these from amazon because of some of the reviews but I’m here to say these are AWESOME. They are legit Apple AirPods and they’re cheaper on amazon! The one on the left is my old pair and the new ones are on the right. There is no difference. Take it from me, you won’t regret it. Just make sure to check your pockets ALWAYS. They are not water proof and the advice Apple gave me did not work for the old ones (leave it out for 24 hours). Good investment if you listen to music a lot, make calls, like the convenience of no cords. Just be careful because it’s a lot of money to lose if you have no AppleCare. Even with AppleCare there are still fees to replace them.

I’d gone through many different types and models of ear buds, and was never happy with any of them. My wife got these for Christmas and they’re astounding... I’ll never go back to the ones with wires attaching the two ear buds. Theses are sensational. Crystal clear audio. The music is like listening to a high end sound system with each instrument audible at any volume and the battery set up with charging in the case while you’re not near a plug to charge is an added feature that cannot be overstated as being very, very cool... Highly recommend these earbuds.

if you will only use these with Apple devices, you will probably be completely thrilled. But if you are connecting to, say, a Sony TV, there are challenges. You can't adjust the volume of the earphones. And if you switch between devices, you have to "connect" again on the device. Again, I think if you were all Apple ios, these issues would arise and you would be 100% happy.

My son loves these because he can charge his phone and listen to music at the same time. His friends gently teased him about having wired headphones. His is happy about the way they fit and the sound is great. This was a good purchase because I was able to save a few dollars. It was a good Christmas gift. You have to keep up with technology and of course that comes at a cost!!!! It was a good purchase.

I hesitated to buy AirPods for a long time because I thought they were quite pricey but when the good deal came available I decided to finally get them. I’m very glad I did as the sound quality is great and they’re so comfortable to wear. I really like how easily they pair with all my Apple devices. All in all, I’m very happy with my purchase.

Airpods:

Now, normally I dont use Apple products besides my iPad pro (2018) and Apple pencil 2nd Gen for drawing.

But I was seeking some sleek, good sounding earbuds that would go well with my iPad. Back when I got my iPad, Airpods were way too much for me. But throughout the years, they have fallen in price. So I decided to buy them here. They were only $115. That, I thought was a steal. I ordered em up, quick! Came just in time. Very quick delivery as well!

I've been using them with my android phone (one plus 6T, or Oneplus 8.) Since I dont own an iPhone and don't desire one as of now. I love customization, custom ROMs, and such.

I have also used them with my iPad, and I must say, the tech is so fast to pair. They sound great, and they look great.

Anyone who has an android phone that were considering getting these, I recommend them, wholely.

Picture taken by me with Google Camera mod.

It's a set of Apple Air Pods. If you don't think they are the greatest thing ever, then you obviously hate democracy and eat babies. Or at least that's what my wife told me - these were a gift to her. I have no use for Apple's overpriced, locked-down stuff. Wife says these work well, sound great, no issues. So, you know, there you go.

review title: This is the most convenient pair of headphones I’ve owned.
review_body: I don’t think the sound quality of the AirPods provide much competition to actual over ear headphones. However, I do think they make up for it with all the convenience they’ve packed into these little earbuds. The AirPods are quick to connect to the last device you’ve used them with, and they have pretty good range on them. I’m able to walk around the office while listening to Spotify without any interruptions. When I’m not listening to anything, I happily place them back in the charging case the AirPods come with. I also would like to point out how great it is to be able to charge your AirPods on the go since the charger case is small enough to fit in your pocket. I’ve used these buds at the gym, in a busy train, and while walking through the bustling streets of Chicago during rush hour without any complaints for sound or noise cancelling. As I’ve mentioned earlier, they won’t perform better than actual premium over the ear headphones in terms of sound and noise cancellation, but they still perform very well given what’s provided and these small little ear buds. I would certainly buy these again, and would completely recommend them to anyone who is curious.

the sound SOUNDS okay, but it's so quiet. there's no noise cancelation at all. that shouldn't even be a category. the battery life started good and has been rapidly decreasing. sometimes they wont link to my phone. sometimes they randomly disconnect. if I turn the volume down for a second when I turn it back up the volume is still quiet until I put them back in the case for a minute. then the volume bar is still all the way down but when I turn it up again it gets louder. same thing if you turn it up accidentally and try to turn it down. I've only had them for 6 months, and I don't even use them that much. I had a better experience with 30$ Bluetooth earbuds from home depot.

These AirPods have good sound and worked reliably until 2 days ago, less than 2 months after purchased, when they stopped pairing properly, and alternately had sound only from the left, then the right.

Messaging contact with Apple Tech Support was an exercise in frustration. An agent who must have been handling several other calls took an hour and a half to walk us through a procedure that should have taken five minutes, finally arriving at the obvious conclusion that there was a problem. Then the fun began, eventually preparing to send them back for evaluation, for which I was told at the last minute that they wanted a credit card deposit for more than I paid for them. The support agent claimed that although the 1-year limited warranty applied to battery issues, it did not apply to connectivity issues. Doesn't sound right.

Surely, Apple could do better than this. At this point I decided to check on Amazon's return policy and discovered that we are still within the time window for return/replacement. So that's what we'll do.

I've bought lots of Apple products and have been generally satisfied, but maybe I'll be less stuck on the brand in the future.

Best purchase of Black Friday 2021. You don’t need the latest version of AirPods, these will do just fine. They have a great battery life. The structure could be slightly better because they do tend to fall out sometimes but no big deal. Buy it, you won’t regret it.

Okay, I am an Apple fan, have been for a while. I love this second-gen over the 3rd gen. they fit and feel better in my opinion. there was only one difference that happened to catch me off guard. There is no indicator light on the front of this set. That is not a problem, but it was a slight difference between my 1st set and this set. They are still my go-to most of the time. (Drag queen streamers delight, wigs and crowns are not a problem with these)

review title: Great sound but may hurt your ears if you have small ears.
review_body:
These are good AirPods. Unfortunately, they hurt my ears. I have bought a total of three of these AirPods. One for my daughter, one for my boyfriend, and one for me. They do not hurt my boyfriend or daughter’s ears, so it may just be me. I do have smaller ears and may be the reason they hurt me.
The sound is amazing. If you are looking for good soundproof earbuds, these are not for you.
I had to buy the AirPods Pro for the extra comfort. The AirPods Pro’s have both amazing sound and soundproof.

These are real AirPods, for those who doubt their legitimacy.

review title: These AirPods have a defective microphone. Buyer beware!
review_body:
These AirPods are EXTREMELY flawed! This is the second pair of second generation AirPods I bought where the microphone completely stopped working. I now have two pairs of AirPods that do not have a working microphone and I need them to talk with for my work. Incredibly disappointed with Apple and this crappy AirPods.

I just bought the third generation and let’s see if those last longer than six months!

review title: Well it did not work out
review_body: First of all it was okay once I received but it kept falling out from my ear. No worries. The following day I lost one ear piece. Oh well I figured I have one to use and listen to music or something. Not really. Couple of days later entirely stopped working and I had to order a new one. Money well spent for a $120 ear phones. Perfect.
