The AirPods are about what you would expect from Apple - spendy, clever, and extremely functional. Sturdy, comfortable, and convenient wireless abilities allow alot of movement whether working out, skating, or mowing the lawn. They have never fallen out of my ears. While there is no real noise cancellation function (or, at least not that I have noticed), and sound quality is pretty good. Where this product really shines, is in the battery charge/recharge ability.

After a year: These are still awesome. There has not been a noticeable decline in charge. They still last about 2 hours between charges. The case only has to be charged about every two days.

Having tried the air-pod pros, I think these are still more comfortable.

Sound quality is still good to excellent.

Mic quality is pretty good.

Only real drawback is the case has a tendency to collect lint and stuff in the cracks and edges from being in your pocket.

Totally still recommend.

I bought these airpods a few months ago just because they had the best price on the market. They arrived as brand new airpods in an apple box. They are made in California but assembled in Vietnam not China. The only thing that apple could have improved would've been the battery life. These are the second generation of the apple airpods.

These headphones aren't too bad. To me the quality is somewhat better than the free headphones you get with your iPhone. They don't do much to block out sound but that's OK with me. I have my Jabra wireless headphones for that. The sound quality is good but not as good as others. Connecting to your iPhone is fast...when it connects. When using them to talk on the phone, the other party says I sound fine and I can hear them well so that's a plus. I find it difficult to have a conversation using headphones that totally block out outside noise. I feel like I sound plugged up but I don't have that sensation with the AirPods.

They are a great buy sound quality is superb battery life is excellent bluetooth connection stays strong and is easy to connect, My only problem with them is how they fit in your ear it can be uncomfortable at times especially when laying down but the more important issue I made this review to discuss is that because of the way these fit in your ear they get ear wax stuck in them very very easily and quickly, because of this you can start to loose your sound quality within 30 days the airpods are not broken and this is not a mechanical issue its just the wax is blocking the holes were the sound comes out of so you cant hear the sound it is also a relatively difficult process to clean them without looking at a tutorial on youtube or somewhere else because of this issue I gave the Airpods 4 stars. thanks for reading.

The set up was fairly easy so far I am enjoying the wireless feature. I got tired of cords and headphones dying on me way to quickly. They are fairly secure in your ears once on, not too easy to fall off. Its worth it to invest in a better pair of headphones that should last. I did have any issues connecting with the blue tooth connectivity. I'm very happy with my purchase so far. I haven't tested the battery life yet though. So its a 5 for now.

review title: If you own multiple Apple Devices, it's the way to go
review_body: So many debate the price and sound quality. I'm not going to do that. I know if that is all you care about you can find better. If you own multiple Apple Devices, it's the way to go. I have a MacBook, Ipad, Apple watch, and Iphone. It switches so easy between them. I use wifi calling a lot and can use any device to do this even when I forget my phone somewhere else. That is why the easy device switching is important to me and it is faster than previous generation.
When I receive them open the box they came just like this looks like they’ve been used and they were broken so only 1 worked didn’t really get to try them out very disappointed

review title: They suck about after a year
review_body: Even though I’m sure to keep my AirPods clean, after a year, so much earwax has been jammed into the AirPods that audio is significantly quieter. Not worth the money. No noise cancellation which is pretty standard at the end of 2021. Battery is great. The AirPods last for a long time but the case starts to deplete faster as you use them. The microphone is horrible. If I had a dollar for everytime I was told I couldn’t be heard, I would probably have AirPods Pro’s anyway. I feel there are better options than these. If you want to spend some extra money, the AirPods Pro’s are a good choice. Silicone tips (which would prevent the earwax issue), great noise cancellation, better microphones, recent. Conclusion is, they’re great for about a year but unless you don’t produce earwax, they start to get quieter.

I really like over the head, noise canceling headphones, but it gets pretty hot over the summer in LA, so I can't wear them as often as I would like. I decided to try the AirPods after several recommendations from my friends. It doesn't cancel external noise, but they feel weightless and they are incredibly easy to set up. The battery lasts a decent amount of time and the charging case is small enough that you can keep it in your pocket. They fit really well. They don't reproduce low frequencies as well as over the head headphones, but they don't sound bad at all. A great buy for non-audiophiles.

I love my AirPods so far! I have only had them for a few days but they have been great for listening to music. The sound quality is amazing and I have had no problems with connecting to my iPhone XS. They connect as soon as I put them in my ears, which is very convenient. They connected right away to my iPad with no problem as well. Battery life is excellent. No issues with that after hours of listening to music. So far I love them and am very happy with my purchase!
Had Gen 1 and used them everyday for 4 years. Picked up these. Same function just as good.

review title: Good earphones, they live up to the hype
review_body: I really like them, and I think they live up to the hype. I love being able to keep my phone in my bedroom and still being able to go to the bathroom while still hearing my music. The battery life is really long, longer than I thought. The case is small and sleek and the AirPods are also small and look good. They may not work for every ear type, as it fell out of my small ears for a while before I got used to them. Pretty easy to connect to my iPhone and they sound nice. I love the features where it stops when you take one out!

I love love love these. Was hesitant to purchase because of price. Wasted $30 on cheaper version and they lose connection a lot and have to turn phone off and on to re connect. These have performed flawlessly. Can set tap control to preference. I det my right to play/pause and left to skip. Excellent.

Not as great as I hoped they'd be.
Upon buying them, you'll have three more things to keep charged all the time.
Supporting software makes it difficult to know precisely how much charge is in either of the three devices (two air pods -- and the charging case).

You'll also be constantly worried about losing them. When you do, Apple will make you pay for the replacement... not cheap, either.

It's hard to wear them for a long period of time -- they start to hurt your ears after a while, as they are only made of hard plastic.

review title: Sometimes the newest is not the best
review_body: I love the 2nd generation AirPods...prior to purchasing them (to gift them to myself for Christmas), I used my wife's...I also asked the young members of my staff for their opinion of the newer-generation AirPods; who unanimously endorsed the 2nd generation over the 3rd and 3rd (pro) generations...sometimes, the newest is not necessarily the best!

This is like my third purchase of the air pods 2. I end up giving them to my kids and then buying another pair for myself. I’m not sure why, but these things seem to sound a lot better than my air pod pros. The bass is much deeper, producing a sound I appreciate a lot more. Weird, cuz I always hear the critics complaining about the opposite. Lucky me I guess!

My sister asked me to order these for her. She seems to like them quite a bit as when she’s home she appears to always have them in. The sound quality is good, and the battery life appears to be good as well. Not sure about the noise cancellation feature so cannot comment on that.
They didn’t arrive the first time it was “supposedly shipped”, so I had to get a replacement which arrived on the expected date. Thanks.

Loveeee!!!

Update: about 3 days later I notice a spot on the back of the AirPods case that looks as if the paint has rubbed off but was repainted with a darker color (see photo, right above thumb), I hadn’t noticed this until yesterday! I’m starting to question if they are the real Apple AirPods because of the other reviews. They work well, but they are cheaper than the ones on the apple website and I want to know why

The left AirPod for these won't connect to the charger. We contacted Apple and they said we had to contact Amazon for them to honor the warranty. I contacted the Warranty Questions team and they will NOT reply. Our year warranty date is approaching and this is incredibly frustrating they won't reply and get this taken care of.

review title: Easy to use! Makes life much easier without wires.
review_body: I was super hesitant to buy AirPods. I thought they were aesthetically I’m appealing they reminded me of Qtips! But I ended up actually really loving these!! They charge super fast and they aren’t IN my ear. Once you open the case they were automatically connected to my phone. I didn’t have to do any setup. The cons are they are not noise cancelling and you have to take them out to talk to someone unless you can hear through them. My bf says they fall out a lot. I think everyone’s ear anatomy is just different. I had The Jabra elite active 65t and I didn’t like stuffing them into my ear every time and they’d fall out. Yes, they were noise cancelling and had this cool hear through function but they wouldn’t stay in, especially my left ear.

If you buy these make sure when you buy it says sold and shipped by Amazon. Do not buy from other sellers because you will get fake AirPods. If you buy from Amazon you will get authentic AirPods for less than you would buy at Apple stores. These have great sound and great battery life. Of course, the more you use them the quicker the battery life would diminish. These are great if you iPhone 7 or greater because there is no earphone/headphone jack and can make it so that you can listen and charge at the same time. A main reason I got this.

I expected to be jumping for joy when I put these pods in my ears. The sound is fine, not superior to my wired ones. I tried to adjust volume by asking Siri to lower the volume and her reply was it’s already high. Tres confusez.
I’m hoping minor headaches are not a permanent part of the joy of using them.
I’ll update when things change.

I thought I grabbed a good deal but it was too good to be true.
At first when I would take the right AirPod out of the case & it would pop up on my notifications, it would glitch as if was unsure if I took it out or not. & an update was giving hoping it would fix the issue but it did not.
I ended up putting both headphones on and it sounded like a bad stereo. The music wasn’t synced. It was just a hot mess. Returning

review title: I like them. I’m trash lowkey.
review_body:
It’s been about three months since I’ve been using my AirPods and aside from memeing with them on the daily, I’ve enjoyed them a great deal. They work really well; the mic transmits my voice well when I call and the sound quality as well as latency is basically the same as using good quality wired earbuds (but much more comfortable in my opinion). They don’t fall out btw. One thing I’ve noticed is that the case and AirPods are prone to getting weird dirt particles attached to them (like fibers from my pockets end up in the case) and stains are a pain to clean. They are white after all soooo makes sense.

Although the sound quality is really good; around this time I’ve started experiencing weird disconnects and lag. Like the signal is getting disrupted but it only really happens when I’m on break at work. At home or when I’m out and about nothing really happens except for a long delay before they sync with my phone. Battery life seems okay; but I think it’s bothersome how I basically have to always leave the case and pods on a charger or they die when they’re not in use. The case I kind of get, but I don’t know why the pods get drained when they’re not connected/playing. Overall I’m satisfied with my purchase; the slight cons don’t really change much for me since I mainly use them when I’m making commutes from home to work or from my room to the bathroom. If you’re an apple person or you wanna buy them just so you can be like “sorry; i didn’t catch that. airpods.” Then go for it. Pop off.

The best thing about these earbuds is how easy they are to use, specifically how they automatically connect to and switch between the devices you’re using. Can seamlessly switch from iPhone to laptop to iPad.

The shortcomings of these earbuds include:
1. Although the tap controls are customizable, there are some key functions that are missing. Mute/unmute is the most obvious missing function.
2. The sound is good, but far from great.
3. The charging case is very slippery, making it very likely that it will slip out of your pocket. I lost my first pair of these because the case slipped out of my gym shorts pocket when I sat down.

I considered buying the new Air Pod Pros but when I saw that I could get 2 pairs of these for the price of 1 Pro, I ended up doing just that by buying a pair for my wife and I. While I am sure the noise cancellation feature in the Pros is great, these work perfectly well for our needs, and particularly good and handy for talking on the phone. My wife and I also used them on a plane and while we could definitely hear engine noise, we were both happy with the sound/quality and even more happy with the price.

name reviewer: Duane And Amazon is the place to get it from.
review_body:
I have had AirPods since day one, after 4 years the battery went dead. 4 years so that speaks for the value and the endurance of the product. On top of that Amazon comes in at the absolute lowest price you can find ! Buy them and I promise you will not regret the purchase!
Amazon is the the place you want to purchase this product, you will not find a better price or product guarantee

I use it predominantly playing golf, which does stress the limits of the device. If I move too far from the iPhone it’s linked too, it’ll cut in and out, or off entirely. It’s not a fair criticism, but it’s my particular use. It’s also odd, when at a distance, the music will tune in and out depending on the position of my head while putting. Again, most people won’t care, but if Apple can improve this, it’ll probably help in other situations. Great sound otherwise and the earbuds are very comfortable over long usage spans.

It took me a long time to buy into these wireless earphones. I had another pair and quite frankly the pairing to the Bluetooth was terrible sound quality wasn’t great and the battery was awful. I finally broke down and bought these and could not be more impressed. The sound quality is great and the battery life is amazing

I got these for my daughter for Christmas. I really wanted to spend less and buy another brand, but..you know. She wanted the "real deal." She LOVES them. I tried them on and couldn't believe the sound quality. Two of the best features: You can charge the case, she can charge her pods on that case. Also, she has found a way to track them if she can't find them. I'm glad I paid the extra for these - the extra price was worth it. She wears them a lot!

review title: I was in love but then 7 months in..
review_body: I loved them! So much! So in love like the honeymoon phase. Then almost 7 months in the left earbud barely has sound. The sound is so low like a whisper. I’m so sad. I spent so much on these babies I should have bought the fricken warranty. I’m so annoyed 😒 just my luck I would get the dummy ones that only last not even 7 months

review title: Apple Earpods: Still Great After All These Years
review_body: Simply a nice upgrade to what I had purchased before. What a difference an apple product makes. OK, so here's the choice: Charging case with a cable or via wifi? Needless money spent there! I just plug the little case in, no issues there and just 1-2 times per week. These are the first generation and for my ears, they are fine, they fit. I am very happy with NOT spending more and getting such a quality earphone. They have worked fine for zoom meetings, walking conversations, and for watching movies at home from my ipad. They easily pop up on your bluetooth screen for whatever device you are using. Just choose "studio earpods" on your screen and they will begin.

I had AirPods 2 years ago gifted from friend. I love the wireless & battery life. The sound quality & removing one ear to stop it from playing..I just don’t like any other wireless earphones. My AirPods gave out they been through a lot the past 3 years. One ear stopped working , I saw this on sale & purchased it last night got it this Morning. Love it! Also I got the warranty doesn’t hurt to have protection if one ear fails.

review title: I LOVE the fit of the Apple AirPods
review_body: I originally purchased the Apple AirPod Pro's or whatever the noise cancelling version of these is but I didn't like the fit of those at all. I really like the way the Apple AirPods fit in my ear and they are so light I can hardly tell they are there but they fit snuggly so it would take a lot to dislodge them. Just be careful taking off a sweatshirt or shirt as they will fall out.

review title: These airpods made me the “Best Gigi Ever”!
review_body: These Apple airpods were a Christmas gift for my teenage granddaughter and she told me they are totally awesome. She uses them all the time, and the noise cancelling feature cancels the family voices right out. We now have to make monkey motions or stand on our heads to get her attention. Oh, and the battery life is great!

review title: Why do we keep buying these
review_body: This is my second pair after losing the first. Why for the love of god do we keep buying this product after losing them easily and they stop working so quickly. I can’t tell you how many troubleshooting videos I’ve watched for these things. I’m moving on. Apple - be better, your quality has absolutely tanked over the years

For ear buds they're great! I don't know if it's Apple Music or Airpods but some of the music I've been listening to for years sound a little different, they're much clearer and the mix is a little different, in a good way. It's like listening to them for the first time. Heads up though: you can't use the airpods as a microphone if you want to use it to make videos or speak into your voice recorder. They won't work.

I bough Airpods 3 from Apple directly and returned within a few days. I was hoping to upgrade from Airpods 2 but they had a terrible fit. Airpods 2 have a great fit, good battery life. The sound is okay not that great for music compared to Airpods 3. But the fit to me is more important. Airpods 3 causes ear pain and falls off from ear compared to 2.

The AirPods them themselves are gen 2 but the AirPods case in gen 1. To be honest I regret buying them from here I should have bought them from the apple store. I know this b/c the light is on the inside and not outside of the case. Also the serial number if you search up the serial number on the case it shows up airpods gen 1.but for the AirPods themselves it shows gen 2. Like I just wanna know why would anyone do this especially Amazon. This is a crazy scam to be honest

Great experience! Second pair, as the first ever pair I had got destroyed by my washing machine... oops. Overall great headphones, they're real yes. Sound great, I wear them at the gym and while working (office work) and the battery life has never been a problem for me. I workout for about 2 hours and they aren't close to dying, and then I put them in the case and I'm good. Got them on sale for about $100 so it was a good deal!

Opened it for the first time and Bluetooth’d to my daughters phone and it says “daddy’s AirPods”

These were told they would be new.... they obviously aren’t.

review title: Wonderful and works well with Galaxy S9
review_body:
I have the Samsung Galaxy S9, and these pair well with the phone. Definitely NOT noise cancelling which is fine (for use at work, or wherever it is important for me to hear ambient noise). However, I use my Bose Soundsport wireless for the gym and other places where I want noise cancellation.
The airpods are not snug in my ear, but so far they have not fallen out - though I am hesitant to wear them jogging. The Bose are better for that. Overall, a very good product.

First, I bought “cheaper” brands because I didn’t want to spend $100+ dollars for headphones! However-I needed up spending MORE because the Cheap Ones didn’t Work!! So, Finally just ordered these. WOW, What a Difference! LOVE that they turn on IMMEDIATELY when u place into your ears. Sound quality awesome. Battery life not as long as I’d like~so I bought 2! Now I ALWAYS have a fresh pair to use!! I should have bought these FIRST and been done with the Hassles. Don’t make same mistake I did.

At the beginning the AirPods were great. But after 3 weeks the sound got lower and lower. If I have my phone on medium volumen I can’t hear anything. I have to have them on high volume to be able to hear the music. At the beginning it wasn’t like that. And I have tried other headphones and the other headphones work just fine with my phone. So I’m sure it’s the AirPods. I will try to go to the Apple store to see if they can fix them.

I think they're great. I've tried a couple of others trying to save money. My main purpose is to use them for phone calls. People that I spoke to with other cheaper models by other manufactures allowed me to hear ok but callers on the other end said the quality was terrible. With these, people on the other end say that the quality is perfect. They're great with music too.
this set of airpods has never given more than 45 minutes of battery time and now, just over a year of use and I am getting only 20 minutes. I find that unacceptable.short

Very good earbuds, I’m very picking about earbuds since some hurt my ears but I’m able to wear these for hours and forget that I am even wearing them. One problem is that when I first got them they wouldn’t charge and they would randomly disconnect and randomly connect for no reason. Hasn’t happened in 2 years but it was a problem that is still happening to people that buy these AirPods. Still highly recommend them

review title: Probably works much better for office types or casual use
review_body: Plumber by trade. Would not recommend if you work manual labor. Thought Apple made good products, but I would recommend getting the cheaper type earbuds. These didn’t last me 4 months. Volume just gets lower and lower with each week of use, mic is not working as good either. Tried to keep them clean every day but I can’t stand the fact that I can no longer hear anything add more than what seems to be 25% volume. Pretty disappointing an apple. Love my phone though

review title: Great - when they work. Which is rarely.
review_body: First, they don’t stay in my ears. Second, the case looks like dental floss. Third, the battery life sucks. Fourth - and the BUYER BEWARE - is the left AirPod stopped working after 1 month. Google “left AirPod not working” it’s been a chronic problem for YEARS!! So far none of the fixes have worked - resetting, restarting device, etc. Fifth. The phone says both L and R are charged 100%, but the iPhone podcast app says the left is 5% charged. Don’t recommend. Regret the purchase. If Apple remedies the problem, I’ll revise the review. They’d be great - if they worked. Disappointing.

Worked for a while, now when using the dictation it puts words I am not saying anywhere near, the battery life is the worst and it will answer calls with the slights of sounds resulting in 12 unwanted phone calls at difficult times (a screaming melt down of a 3 year old figuring out boundaries isn’t a time to talk thanks a lot headphones)

review title: Challenging to keep them in my ears
review_body: I like that they don't have a chord, but they could be improved by making them easier to stay in my ears. I'm used to in ear monitors that fit snugly down in my ear canal. It has taken me a couple of weeks to figure out the best way to put them in my ears, so they don't fall out. The noise cancellation is nonexistent. I have some bluetooth headphones that work much better than these. When I'm wearing these airpods I know if someone is talking to me. If I want to drown out the noise, I'll have to wear my headphones instead.

I lost my last set of Airpods after three years...the battery life was getting bad, so I was happy to buy another pari while waiting for the new Airpod Pro's to be back in stock.
I really love these headphones. They stay in my ears (even while running a 1/2 marathon) and have great sound quality.
They charge fast and last for several hours while listening to books podcasts etc.
They are worth the $$!
Just don't lose them or it will break your heart. Luckily I got them quick with PRIME!

I've had issues with the right Airpod since I purchased these. It always dies way before the left Airpod. I have tried cleaning it and the case. I have tried repairing the device and all of the other Apple suggestions on what to do when this happens. Nothing has fixed the problem. I try charging just the right Airpod at times and my iPhone will say it i fully charged but then I will only get about 5 minutes of listen time before it dies again. Not sure if I got a faulty pair, but it is really frustrating since I spent so much on these.

review title: Can’t believe I waited so long!
review_body: These air pods are much more comfortable than I imagined they would be and the sound quality is fantastic! I’m very pleased with this purchase. I let my hubby check them out and he looked at me and said, “Get me a pair”! Looking forward to sharpening my beginning French skills and listening to awesome music. Great bargain!

review title: Can’t go back to wired headphones once you buy them
review_body:
Finally got the AirPods after months of denying the need for it. If you are a MacBook user and upgrade to any of the iphones post iPhone 6s, you’ll end end up with headphones that work with your phone but not the MacBook Pro. So annoying, Apple! So eventually you’ll have to get the AirPods to solve the problem (so that you don’t carry the dongle everywhere only to lose it).

Now the actual product review - good design allowing the headphones to charge while in the case. These work best for just about everything except workout (coz sweat may spoil them) and flight travel (no noise canceling).

I've wanted wireless headphones since before airpods became a thing. These are exactly as promised, and came sealed in a white apple box. They hold a charge for like 8 hrs of continuous use and I've had them about a month. I love to take them on walks with me so I can listen to podcasts. I've used them on phonecalls and haven't had an issue.

Me acaban de llegar mis AirPods y vienen totalmente sucios

Con varios rayones
Descargados

Boy a poner a cargar para revisar si funciona bien

Desepcionado

There is a serious deteriorating bluetooth connection issue with iPhone (11 pro). It becomes more and more common after half year of use that iPhone shows the airpods are connected but the sound still goes to speaker; or there is no sounds in either airpods or speakers. It's unclear what's the issue. I typically have to try turn the bluetooth on and off several times before it's back to normal state.

I am loving my new Airpods, and I do not even have an iPhone! These are just great headphones and they are so much less expensive than the newest latest and greatest model!

One thing I would recommend is to buy those little ear hook things that help the ear bud stay in your ear. These are especially helpful when using the Airpods for working out/running.

Otherwise, the case fits conveniently in your pocket, its lightweight, battery life is great, these are perfect!

review title: Didn’t work properly after only 5 months
review_body: Have sent in 3 times for repair. First time only had for 4 1/2 months. Left AirPod sound muted. Nothing I have done. Returned to Apple they “fixed” it but now 2 months later same problem. Sending back AGAIN. Ridiculous after spending over $100 on them. Not worth it in my opinion.

I am an apple fan, and the airpods is a no brainer when it comes to wireless earphones if you adopted the apple ecosystem. I really like the feature where it auto connects to your apple device when taken out and also it remembers which apple device you last listen to and connects to that. Also the auto pausing feature it has just puts it way ahead of other competitors. And not to forget the image upgrade it brings to the person wearing it. Definitely a buy!

(READ ALL)I bought these AirPods off of Amazon, for my daughter’s birthday, She was so happy and excited. I was a little worried of them being fake or not working properly or anything like that. But I was completely wrong they work amazing the sound quality is great. To be able to get both of your AirPods charged equally make sure that your charging case is fully charged. And then overnight place in your AirPods insider charging case that way you have your AirPods and AirPod Case charge for the rest of the day. I have not had any technical difficulties so far with the AirPods. They are very comfortable, they don’t slip out MY ears.
In my opinion these are great!! If you go out a lot and love listening to music and don’t want to have wired headphones and having the wire dangling around, this would be a great option for you if you love going on runs, or just in general go out a lot And wanna listen to music these are great. Love them and would recommend you to buy them!! (They also work amazing with phone calls)!( also the button on the back is to turn it off and on) The sound quality on this is amazing it doesn’t have the best noise cancellation but if someone’s talking to you you probably wouldn’t hear them but sound is amazing and it’s loud enough!!

These seem a bit larger in the ear than the earphones that come with the phone. They are tight fitting with no way of adjusting the fit. Right ear started hurting as the airpod felt like it was pressing against the cartilage of the ear. Strangely they feel so tight that my ears begin to hurt after 30 min of use, but also they feel like they will fall put of the ear because they are super smooth. I should have waited for the air-pod pros. I was going to give these to the girlfriend, but she doesnt even want them. Do not fall asleep with them, woke up from ear pain.

I’m so glad I got these after holding off on them for so long😎 I had some Bose SSW earbuds before these and honestly, these are significantly better IMO. I’m gonna keep this short so here are the 3 main things I love;
1. Instant pairing
2. Sound quality (phone calls, music, movies)
3. Find my AirPods (only works if it’s connected BUT you can still get the last known location)

review title: Hard to keep in MY ear
review_body:
I like them a lot and get pumped by the music, but I have always had a tough time keeping any ear bud or earphone
in my ear, I always needed the soft silicone pieces to stick. I don't know if there is a way to get a soft cover over these
to help me keep the air pods IN.
UPDATE: Just bought a pair of ear hooks that loop over the ear and NOW I can listen to air pods and enjoy
the sound while I workout or do lawn work. I wish the ear hooks were around 2 years ago when I first bought them.

There's not much bad to say. They work great, the pod charger thing is a a great idea.

Problem is, with careful use, my last pair lasted about 14 months before they just died. That's way to short a life span.

Still, when it comes to usage, it's better than anything like it. Sigh. I hate you Apple. Now take my money, damn you!

review title: If you like the tried and true wired, you'll like these
review_body: Ive never been able to find a good pair of rubber tipped headphones that fit or stay in your ear while active so the wired Apple headphones have always worked best for me. I got a new phone with no aux port so had to switch to wireless. These fit the exact same as the normal wired headphones that used to come with new iPhones. Good purchase.

Love how they fit. Like that I can listen to one while the other charges. Never without battery life. Love the case. Nice and sturdy.
Great for while you’re working you can answer phone calls or send and receive texts with a tap on your ear! No more digging for my phone just to see it’s a spam call!
Extra bonus…got them on sale!

review title: official Apple product. the AirPods are version 2. Registered them with Apple after purchase.
review_body: These are the real deal Apple AirPods 2. The headphones themselves are the newer version 2 but the case is just the older style and not wireless charging. I really didn’t need the wireless charging so I just went with these. Works great and the battery life is stellar. I use em all day and only have to charge every couples days. Would definitely buy again.

I almost bought the third generation but had concerns about them fitting or staying in my ears. These are a great product and the price was far less than on the Apple web site. They link quickly to my devices and have good sound quality. They also came on the day I ordered them. Very pleased with this purchase!

They fit well, are convenient, and the battery life is surprisingly long! I get 2-3 charges from the case which lasts me 2 days, but I literally have my airpods in 24/7. I am an avid runner and these stay locked in my ears the entire time!
I've had a tiny bit of issue where sometimes (rarely) one airpod won't play anything, but putting them back in the case and taking them out again fixes it.

The only downside is that since I have long hair and these are wireless, people will try to talk to me and I won't hear them, giving the impression that I am ignoring people and being rude.

Really makes me angry that Apple has proprietary stuff, and then it doesn’t work. These lasted about 20 months before beginning to have connective issues intermittently. Now the right one won’t work at all. So now I’m stuck blowing away another $200 bucks to replace them. That’s b.s. And not the only one complaining about this.

review title: Not great for hearing impaired? Correction - Now Great for hearing impaired on phone (but not mac)
review_body: In my original review I noted that the airpods are very comfortable and convenient to pair with Iphone and computer. They seem to be optimized for music, where they sound pretty good. However, they were problematic for listening to voices on telephone or zoom. Voices were muddy. But today I discovered that you can do a custom adjustment on the iphone (settings>accessibility>Audio/Visual>Headphone Accommodations - yes it's buried deep). With that I now get voice sound on telephone and on zoom (using the iphone for zoom) that is great. The only problem is that I can't find any way to get that adjustment when I am using the Airpods with my macbook pro. Zoom on the mac is very muddy voice. Apple, please address that.

Works perfectly. Love them. As far as Apple AirPods in general, I wish the tapping controls had more functionality but in general I love the look and feel and quality experience of them. Yeah. If I lost these I’d buy another set. But, I also keep my wired buds and also a cheap Anker wireless buds that give more control over the functions. They all sound good and all have their uses.

I got these for a substantial discount. So I wasn't expecting them to be wonderful. The sound quality was excellent. The noise cancellation was very good. The battery life was average. And I have a hard time keeping them in my ears. But they work and for the kinds of calls that I do, they are sufficient. But if you want something for exercising or longer listing periods, probably not your best choice.

review title: These hurt like hell even after they fall out.
review_body:
I've tried for two weeks to get used to these airpods. Bought some silicon covers to help hold them in my ear. As the silicon warms up, they fall out anyway. Just slip out without any encouragement. And even though they don't fit snug enough to stay in my ears, they are miserably uncomfortable. I wore them for a walk today and five hours later my ears still ache.

I liked everything else about these. :(

You can’t hear out of them. You need to turn the volume all the way up and then the sound is so muffled and you can’t hear it clearly. Everyone around you can hear a muffled noise also when it’s at the top volume. My kids would rather use the cheap headphones that come with the phone rather than these. We tried fixing with tips on Fb and Apple. Nothing worked. I bought 2 of these for my kids and they won’t even use them. So disappointed.

review title: I guess they are pretty good...
review_body:
I didn't even consider buying AirPods for a while, as there are definitely many more affordable options for bluetooth earphones. However, I never seemed to be fully satisfied with the other options I tried. The sound quality is great, they connect flawlessly and I love that it's easy to switch between devices.

My only concern is that I have smaller ears and thick, puffy hair. I sometimes find the AirPods will get loose due to the fit or getting caught in my hair. Not a deal breaker for me, but I can't see myself wearing them when I'm too active because I'm fearful I may lose one.

After the second time I tried them, the left airpod would no longer charge and had to bring them to the apple store. The apple store representative told me the AirPods were defective and that I needed to contact Amazon to get them replaced. Talked to Amazon and they are replacing them. Apple needs to fix this charging issue with the AirPods stems because they don’t last very long or are defective or cheaply made.

I have been an Apple fanboy since they came out with iPods. These little guys are amazingly light weight, sound quality is amazing, and I can have in on for most of the day without worrying about the battery life. I did not get the noise canceling ones, but with these on I can hardly hear other noises around me. Must have item in my opinion.

review title: Excellent sound, and frees user up from being tied to their phone!
review_body:
My first pair lasted just about a month and the left one failed...no more sound in L AirPod.

I called AMAZON and I had a new replacement within 2 days! This second pair works great so far.

My son has had these for several years and has never had a problem with sound or charging. He steered me towards this product and I am glad!

So much easier to be using the AirPods for phone calls and not having to hold my phone anymore or use the speaker. I hear well with these and I can walk away from my phone to attend to something I need to do. Others hear me well when I am conversing with them on the phone while using the AirPods.

Very good product, excellent Amazon support for first 30 days or so on this item and then continued support is available through Amazon.

I've had my AirPods for about 2 months and I've had some discomfort with the left one. I figured I'd get used to it and discovered today that I have a small cut inside my ear from an uneven seam on the AirPod.

On the plus side, the sound quality is great and I like the functions available through the AirPods. If you're new to AirPods, take the time to go through the Tips section on your iPhone.

I prefer how this earbuds fit in my ear but YMMV. Sound is decent enough for music and podcasts. Battery life could be a bit better but the case and earbuds charge fast. Occasionally I have pairing issues with my iPhone 11 but it’s a quick fix when it happens. Next to no sound isolation so if that’s a priority for you look elsewhere.

I've bought two pairs of airpods. The first was last year for my boyfriend. They work great and he's never had any problems. I bought a pair for myself and it would never connect to my phone or charge and I was easily able to return/exchange. Now I'm on my third pair and they were fine for about 2 weeks, now the left one doesn't charge at all. Trust me I've tried everything humanly possible to fix it and I cannot, even when the case and airpods were full charged they died within 2 hours of use. Of course, the return window ended like 3 days ago. I really want my money back so I can just buy directly from Apple, these same fake. Don't waste your money.

I’ve wanted a pair of air pods since they first came out but never could bring myself to pay that much for headphones. Well I’m glad I finally did because these little guys are amazing. The battery life lasts almost all day for me, the sound is incredible! They don’t cancel out a lot of noise which is what I wanted anyways since I have kids and need to be able to hear them when they call for me. I think these AirPods are worth every penny because I use them everyday and I’m in love with them. Not a single complaint from me.

This is the second pair of air pods ordered. The right side won’t work. These were for my teenage daughter. She spent 2 hours on the phone with 7 different Apple techs to troubleshoot, only to find out that that the serial number on the box doesn’t match the air pods so they couldn’t help her. They said it the fault of Amazon for mixing up the box with the pods. We will be returning these. Not sure how that can happen.

I love my AirPods!! I read all the negative reviews saying there fake but I don’t agree. the sound quality is good and they sync and work perfectly with my iPhone. These are not the current generation AirPods but Its not a big deal to me. the charging light is in the inside and not the outside because its not a current model and I compared my AirPods with AirPods sold in a large retail store and they look the same and the price was exactly the same. If you want current generation AirPods they will cost you more money but they function exactly the same way, not a big difference

I can’t really give a full review on this. I will say that when I first opened them both pods( left and right) worked. However, after trying them on a second time. It seemed that only 1 side would work. I thought maybe just needed a reset. After resetting it every way you could possibly imagine. There was simply no way to have both AirPods work at the same time. Once I put both AirPods in the case. The flashing amber lights come on. I did try to hold the button for 15 seconds. Still didn't work. Getting a replacement one sent. Hopefully this doesn’t have any problems.

I bought these expecting a nicely polished product from Apple. I got the opposite. They cut out horribly nonstop, and I have tried troubleshooting them from every angle possible. I am working from home, and spend most of the day on the phone. These have caused more problems that they are worth, and they're likely going to end up in the trash. I would not recommend buying these for remote work purposes. They also amplify strange noises, like quietly opening packages/envelopes. Sounds like that are amplified through the mic, and are deafening to people on the other side.

All that being said, for simple music listening, they work. The audio quality is so-so, but they work. It's nice to not have to hassle with cords at the gym.

I tried the Samsung Galaxy Buds before these (they had good reviews and were cheaper), but they didn’t fit my ears well, they pressed on the cartilage in my ears and the sound was not at good. So I got these and I ave been SUPER happy. They fit just like the ear buds that come with iPhones (so not perfect, but they are comfortable for smaller ears). I use one at a time while listening to podcasts, books, or talking on them to make the battery last longer.

I purchased these hoping would hate them and could subsequently return them. Unfortunately, I immediately loved them. While I initially thought they were pricey, I would say the cost is justified for the product. They seem to be a bit more comfortable than the regular apple earbuds, and fit well in my ear even with a daith piercing (regular earbuds did not fit). Sound and battery quality is great. I love that they fit in tiny skinny jean pockets so that I can always have them with me. As a bonus, I feel like a cool person when walking around with these, as I bought them maybe a year after they became popular.

review title: Every bit as good as the wired earbuds-without the wires.
review_body: My first wireless earbuds. I’ve had Apple’s wired buds forever and decided to try the wireless. Ordered the AirPods 3 but they were too big for my ear canal and I worried about them falling out. Sent them back and got the AirPods 2 and they fit just like the old wired ones. The 2’s may not have quite as good a sound as the 3’s but, honestly, I’m not sitting in a dark room listening to every note of “Dark Side of the Moon”- I have over-the ears for that!

I’m not sure how legit these are. My boyfriend purchased his headphones from Walmart and we did a comparison as far as how long these things hold charge. Today I disconnected my headphones early in the morning. We were both at 100% at 12pm now 8pm and he’s at 80% and I’m at 30% I spent a lot of money on these like everyone else. Last thing I want to do is to keep exchanging something I had less than a week 🤨

This product was great, but after about 5 months they stopped syncing to my phone. I ran every diagnostic test and tried everything the internet and Apple told me to try. Still nothing.

It's obnoxious that products like these are beholden to the one month return window. That's okay for something like a shirt or mop. But tech should have a much longer window.

Just another reason I stopped buying from Amazon.

These are great and comfortable to wear although they have fell out of my ear several times, which is worrisome. They charge really fast which is a plus and can last a while. I wish they were a little bit louder although that probably wouldn’t be best if you’re worried about your hearing. I like the fact that they are cordless but I wish I could use them while on my laptop. I haven’t been able too.

review title: These are in fact gen 2 airpods in a gen 1 case
review_body: First off These are gen 2 airpods in a gen 1 case so it comes with the added Siri functionality and such, just not the wireless charging of course. They sound pretty crisp for the most part, and they embrace bass instead of being allergic to it like some cheaper wireless earbuds. They charge really really fast too, 15 minutes of charging for 3 hours of playtime! The experience is seamless, everything works as it should consistently. Not many earbuds topping these besides the pros of course. Good buy

All right, I've seen waaaaayy too many reviews about how these airpods are the first generation instead of the second. LOOK AT THE PICTURE! It literally that the dot is in the case instead of outside. C'mon, guys, we're in like the future now. Also I just showed a picture to show how cool lookin they lookin look. (Btw please clean your airpods guys it's so disgusting when I see earwax all around in the case and in the airpods)

Arrived with the left one not working. So, I ran to my local Apple store. They had to send it out for repair. That was on Saturday and they were delivered back to my home by Tuesday. So, it was a little frustrating to have them arrive not working, but having them fixed was pretty pain-free and I only had to wait a couple extra days. I do love my airpods!

Sounds perfect. They are original Apple AirPods in the original box wrapped up in plastic. Been already using it for about 2 hours and battery life is at same percentage. Came with a charger. Easy to pair once I took my iPhone out it automatically asked to pair.

Was torn between this one and the Pro model but I’m glad I went with the regular AirPods 2. They are super comfy and sound quality is plenty good for my liking. Battery life is superb and I use it everyday. I don’t have any complaints. Only con I can think of is that the case can attract all kinds of lint and other things when they are in your pants pockets all day. No biggie tho. Love mine!

Please disregard my first review as there was a bit of confusion as to APPLE's warranty v.s. seller's RETURN policy. The seller, as it turns out, was never at fault in this case for which I do humbly apologize. The seller deserves an A+++...... but the product itself does not due to the intermittent performance & extremely short reception distance. I will be relying on the manufacturer's 1 year warranty !

review title: ALWAYS STARTS PLAYING AT MAX VOLUME
review_body: These consistently play at max volume for the first 10 seconds they start up. I am usually good about remembering and let them play super load before they quiet back down to a reasonable volume. Yesterday I forgot and now I think I have permanent hearing damage. for over 24 hours I have had a constant high pitch sound in my ear. I will be going to my doctor tomorrow to talk about the potential damage these headphones did to my hearing. 1 star because it is legitimately dangerous to use.

I know some people were concerned that this was a knockoff product, but it was not. I received the Airpods in original Apple packaging with serial number. I am very happy with my purchase as it was exactly what I expected. Good wireless headphones for everyday use that transfers with easy between my many Apple products (MacBook, iPad, and iPhone). That's easily the best part for me, their smooth integration with all other Apple products. They are not the top of the line wireless headphones for sound quality and features, if that is what you're looking for, but perfect for my daily use.

I didn’t want AirPods.
I didn’t think they looked good.
I didn’t think they would look good on me.
Then, my brother got them for me. And i’ve never been more grateful. They’re Incredible, they’re so convenient and sturdy. I’ve dropped them from 4-6 feet plenty of times and they barely even scratch. I promise you’ll like them once you have them, and if you already want them you’ll be grateful if you do get them. I even got my girlfriend (who didn’t want airpods) some and she too loves them now. It’s easily worth the money.

review title: Best wireless earbuds I have ever owned
review_body: I was a little hesitant to get these at first. I had heard reports of AirPods falling out of people’s ears and getting lost. I had one of my AirPods fall off on a plane seat. Other than that, I have not had any other problems with my AirPods. Siri does require you to speak clearly when making requests, so don’t mumble. Or else she’ll not understand what you want her to do for you.

I bought these expecting to have an issue with them falling out like standard wired earbuds. I was wrong, I have had them over 2 months now and have not had them drop out yet. This past weekend, I was doing a major system upgrade for work which had me on my Cell phone in a noisy Ice rink (kid had hockey camp), and I was on a Webex for 8 hours 2 days in a row, the great thing was after 3 hours, of talk time I knew I would need to charge them. but was able to do them one at a time and then go back to both of them. The sound quality and background noise elimination were great.

The batteries on my original AirPods failed after about a year so I needed a replacement. I thought about upgrading to “Pro,” but the price scared me off. These are excellent. Their device switching is must better than my original pair and the battery life is much improved also. Comfortable to wear with excellent audio quality and the microphone pick up for calls is unsurpassed in a device this small.

review title: AirPods not charging and got awful support experience
review_body:
Right earplug is discharging to 0% in a charging case if both earplugs are being charging.

If I eject left earplug from the case then right earplug starts charging.

Support person just walked me through standard script without reading (or understanding) what is my problem. If it is 0% charged - let me explain how to charge it! If it is 100% charged then let me explain how to reset connection! F#! My problem is I cannot charge both plugs simultaneously but there is no script about this and they do not want to listen to me.

I bought these from one of the used offers so they were a little bit cheaper, no damages to the box or anything, they were basically brand new, just had to change the name once I paired them to my phone. They were exactly what I was expecting and I'd definitely purchase again. Thanks Apple.

review title: Apple first generation iPods are a great buy for their price points.
review_body: Made the purchase for my son. He uses how iPods for social media, music and his virtual learning. Like any child’s he can sometimes misplace them, cost makes them easier to replace when lost. The fact that I can replace them if lost or damaged if I add them to my apple coverage with my other devices reduces my cost when they do have to be replaced. More often then not lower cost items cannot be insured.

review title: Sound quality took a nose dive
review_body: I loved them at first. Great integrated design with the charging case. Super fast linking to iPhone. They have always been in the house and have never seen any moisture or other contaminants. The sound quality is quite bad; high end is cut quite a bit. Often have to reposition the left one in order to balance out the volume. I was a big fan but can’t stand them now.

Love my air pods. Use them for work everyday. Wires always got in the way while doing construction. With wireless ear buds makes everything so much easier. Love them they look great for a nice case for them to keep them protected. They last pretty long. I use one ear bud at a time so they last me all day.

review title: These Become Faulty After a Month
review_body: After a month of regular use, these AirPods will begin to show faulty behavior. More often now when taking the AirPods out of the case and putting them into my ears, one AirPod does not work. So, then I have to constantly place them both back into the case, close the cover, and start over again; or disconnect the AirPods and re-connect them through bluetooth. This is extremely frustrating and inconvenient when you need them to work. Apple needs to ensure that their products can perform even basic functions as intended before releasing them to the consumer market - totally useless, defective tech.

I'm not sure if these are genuine Apple or not. I've owned another pair before which work as you'd expect but i bought them from the Apple store when they first came out. The ones from Amazon don't seem to connect right away and sometimes i have to manually tell it to connect to my bluetooth on my iPhone SE again. I tried these on my wife's 11 Pro and same thing occurred; it took a long time to connect.

review title: Not for small ears, I’m afraid.
review_body:
Beautiful quality in appearance and function.
My ears are too small for these and they became painful after a little while.
Then when I didn’t put them in as far to avoid pain I didn’t take them out when I got up and they fell out.
It would be a welcome addition to include little adapters.

review title: If you like EarPods, you’ll like AirPods.
review_body:
Am avid runner and iOS user. Switched to wireless earbuds a year ago and never looked back. These work for me and stay in my ears for 10+ mile runs while sweating. Battery life is great, works with Siri, and range of Bluetooth great. Haven’t used during cold weather yet. A lot better than those $40 knock offs I bought first.

One time a did experience where only one AirPod was working. I just turned Bluetooth off and back on, it was remedied. It might be because I don’t keep my Bluetooth on all the time due to me browsing NSFW content frequently. Haven’t had the problem since.

I actually like these earbuds and feel that they fit comfortably in my ears. I have super small ear canals and the earbuds that fit IN my ears never fit comfortably. I downloaded an app that enables me to get my calls and to hang up by tapping the earbuds (as if I had an iPhone). I've been pleased with the sound quality and those who are on the other end of my calls have noted that the call quality is really good. Battery life could be better but overall all this is a good purchase for sure!

These things are great. The hey Siri feature makes them much better than the original version. I wasn’t a fan of the AirPods Pro with the supposed noise cancelation as they just created white noise and I felt every bump in the road in my ear drums. So, you get a great product that just works with the base model. Also, I didn’t see the need for wireless charging as the case lasts a long time and only needs charged two or three times a week. (unless you use them for 16hours a day...)

If you're looking for noise cancelling/ sound quality, these are not the right headphones. I have better quality headphones for the gym. I wanted these for work and school, to be discrete about my listening. I didn't want it to be noise canceling because I still wanted to be able to hear people talking to me

Every kind of headphone hurts my ears; over-ear or in-ear, cheap and expensive. I can’t have them on/in for more that an hour, and even that’s stretching it. I decided to try these because there was an Amazon coupon, and they are definitely the best I’ve tried! I can barely feel them in. And they are pain-free to set up, as in no setup/pairing needed AT ALL. I love how I can go from listening on my iPad to my iPhone to my Macbook with no complications whatsoever. Great buy!

Bought this pair as a gift for my mom but own my own. I use them daily for working out they fit my ear well are never uncomfortable and never fall out even during lots of jumping sound Quality is great And the battery life is amazing I can typically use them For the gym a few days In a row before they die however I typically just plug the case in to charge during my workout so they just stay charged all the time

The air pods refuse to connect to my iPhone and when it does it’s for a split second. The second it connects to my phone it immediately disconnects before any sound comes out of it. I messaged the “seller” or whatever to ask what I could do to make them work and they never answered, and since my mom has been in the hospital money is tight and now I can’t even return them. Worst experience buying from here, and I am furious about it.

So yea my AirPods won't connect to any of my devices and yes before u ask i did reset, repair and try the stuff they tell you to do online. Im heading into the apple store this weekend to see id they can help but the fact that i haven't had these for even a year and there acting up is straight up annoying especially because of the price point. now don't get me wrong i really enjoyed these up until now but idk what's going on I've never got them wet and have only dropped them about twice when they fell out of my ear when i bent down to grab something. Ill update if i can get them fixed at the apple store but as of right now its a no from me I'm a bit disappointed

review title: Stopped Working After A Few Months
review_body: After owning these for less than one year the right AirPod started to sound lower than the left AirPod. A week later the left AirPod began to sound low as well. Now, I can hardly hear any sound out of both AirPods. I have to turn the volume up to the max just to hear out of my AirPods. I’m disappointed because these AirPods won’t last longer than a year.

I'm an office manager so I spend a great deal of time on the phone and typing on my keyboard at the same time. The airpods work great for me! I was so tired of trying to hold my phone to my ear by leaning to one shoulder or the other, or putting my phone on speaker, which bothered my boss. Now I can talk hands free without crimping my neck or making the whole office listen to the speaker phone. Also, it works great because no one I speak to when using the airpods has to ask me to repeat myself. They can hear me loud and clear now. :-)

These were a Christmas gift for our daughter who was tired of having her iPhone fall and jerk her earbuds out of her ears. She says these are great and she loves them. She said she walked quite a distance from her phone without thinking and was surprised that they still worked from that far away. So, I guess I would recommend them since she’s happy.

I chose the gen 2 over the recent releases because the shape of it fits perfect in my ear! The ones with the round rubber ear piece at the end usually fall out or come loose, but these sit perfect in my ear. The sound quality is great, super easy to pair with my phone, and those it's not noise cancelling, turning up what you're listening to usually covers it. Highly recommend!

I been wanting a pair of AirPods for a while now, but never really had the funds for them due to how expensive they were. But I saw these and I knew I had to have them once they came down in price. They arrived today and they really live up to the name! I been using them all day and I love how they fit in my ears comfortably and how easy it was to pair them. Not only that,but the sound quality is amazing and I love the little case it comes in. It's so cute! If you love Apple products, then this is for you! Five stars!

review title: Loss is part of the Apple sales strategy
review_body: Back to school time...time to purchase my 5th pair of airpods for my teenager! Did you know teenagers can lose one or both earbuds with such regularity? Apple is so smart to sell these to teenagers, knowing they will be repeat customers by default for life. No, I will not buy the Pro's! I'm a sucker, but not that stupid...

These are the real deal. I love them. Didn’t realize I needed them till I started wearing them.
I can walk around the house without my phone attached to my hand and carry on a conversation while doing other things.
Sound quality on both sides is excellent.
Also, they stay put...even while jogging. Comfortable and charge quickly.
Not as bulky as my beloved Bose. Great to have both.
I wear these every day. Excellent ear buds!

review title: Fell out of ear- LOSt forever.
review_body: I believe ear pods stretch out your earholes the way your feet stretch out leather slip on shoes. After using a few days EarPods fell out. I had phantom pod syndrome and it still felt jammed in even though it was missing. I think i will have to return to wireless that are wired together as they don't sell replacements. So I am looking for a left side if anyone is stuck with a half set.

review title: Great for calls! same feeling as the wired earpods
review_body:
I was NOT looking for a noise cancelling plugs, just a handsfree "headset". I'm on the phone a lot and the wired earpods were starting to get on my nerves. Got these at a $100 sale.. exactly what I was looking for.
I need external ambience feedback when I'm on the phone -- otherwise I tend to speak very loud --, and these are perfect for that purpose.
at $100, very happy with the gen2.

Great all around headphones. I use them to work out and they stay in throughout. Very comfortable to wear for long periods of time. The sound quality is good as long as your expectations are not that high because these are not noise canceling or over the ear headphones. If you just need some good wireless headphones with great battery life, comfortable on most ears and sound good get this.

name reviewer: Jay M. Nelson, MHA, BSN, RN, MDI/Coroner
review title: Better than I would have ever expected!!!
review_body:
I really can’t say enough good things about these AirPods. I have purchased the “knock off” brands that look similar and have had multiple problems with them. I was a little hesitant in spending the extra cash... compared to the $30 “knock offs”. But after opening the box the AirPods, they immediately were recognized by mu iPhone. The sound quality was probably the best I have ever experienced with earbuds. I think they are better than a pair of Bose that I used to use... These are the real deal.. The size of the case is smaller and feels very well constructed. Like I said... I am completely satisfied and would recommend.. do not waste your time on the “knock off” brands... Go for the AirPods!!!
Thanks
Jay

review title: Why did I wait to buy these?!?
review_body: Apple did not disappoint with these AirPods. I hesitated because it’s a big price commitment, but I’ve been sooo happy with them. The sound is so clear, the charge time is great. If you receive a call or text, Alexa will tell you and you just speak a return text or tell her yes or no if you want to accept the call, then music will resume afterward. Ultimate. Boom. Mic drop.

review title: Really cheap, u can feel the difference between a real one and this one
review_body: Very cheap product, it always disconnects and has a hard time connecting. It’s a noticeable difference that this one is lighter to apple AirPods from the apple store. Honestly for 100$ this was a ripoff. So many headphones with way better sound and cheaper that I could’ve gotten instead of these. Don’t waste ur time buying these especially since people OVERHYPE THEM AND THINK UR ONLY COOL IF U HAVE AIRPODS AirPods suck

I am so happy I bit the bullet and bought these. The sound quality is great and they pair quite fast. Great for runs and jogs! I love being able to do them while washing dishes, etc. Also: make sure you are ordering directly from Amazon and NOT from a third party! If you’re ordering from a third party seller, you run the risk of receiving fake ones. No one ordering who has Amazon prime or is ordering them directly from Amazon is going to receive “fake” airpods. Be smart!

This is my 2nd pair of pods and the 2nd time that something has gone out on it.. Contacted Amazon and it was 7 days past their return policy so I had to contact APPLE, Contacted Apple and they set my up an appt for the "GENIUS BAR", Went at my appt time and still waited over an hour for someone to help, Per Genius Bar they are not sure why it is not working but would need to send it in to see what is wrong but it could take up to 3-4 wks... Absolute Garbage PODs and Amazon not taking care of Business customers just added fuel to this issue...

Got these on Prime day and I am glad I did! They are the best way to listen to anything on my iPhone or iPad. I bought them for the wireless feature which is amazing. The sound quality is better than I expected. They charge super fast and last for hours before needing a quick recharge. The case stays charged longer than the buds so you just pop them in the case and get more juice. I can’t wait to travel with them!

review title: Quality product. Good for fans of apple products
review_body: Got these for my son he loves them. These are more of a status purchase rather than being the best option available. I got a pair for my mother and she is able to use them with ease. Good for fans of apple products works well with apple devices. I personally use the galaxy buds plus and feel they are better. But these are a solid buy apple makes a quality product. Can't go wrong with them.

At first I was a skeptic, no way was I paying $160 for a pair of earbuds; wireless or not. However I jumped on the recent sale and have not regretted it a single day.

I have dropped them in water by accident and they still work. Durable, good sound quality. Noise cancellation could use work- people around you will hear what you’re listening to.

Price leaves room for improvement considering you can purchase fake ‘Airpods’ elsewhere for $20.

review title: As expected the Apple ear pods work great!
review_body: Air pods work great. I can transition between all my Apple devices with ease. Just love the sound quality. Especially after a bad experience with a cheaper brand.

This is a product that most people have already but if you don’t have AirPods I would highly recommend them. I was hasty towards buying them at first but now that I have them I can’t let go. They have an amazing battery life, my AirPods were at 2% and then 5 minutes later after charging them they were at 34%!! They are so lightweight, and just so easy to use. Although, they don’t have a great sound transparency, but if you want that then I would suggest getting the AirPods Pro because they have that feature. But there is some transparency depending on how loud you set the music volume. Overall I love them and it’s such a great buy, definitely worth the money!!

These headphones look good and fit in ear well enough. They do not create a seal around the ear. The sound is good for what it is. Compared to other headphones these are a lot easier and straightforward to connect and use with other apple products. I think its a over priced for what you get and can get better quality from others brands at similar price ranges. The time I have spent with the headphones they have proven to be reliable and easy to use and I do not regret my purchase.

My first pair and I love them I like how u can tap your ear piece and it change the song it’s definitely different from having the regular one I like that I can move around more esp having a special need child and 3 other kids it most definitely comes in handy only thing I don’t like it seems to fall out your ear at times so I would most definitely not use them if I have to use the bathroom wish they could fit tighter into the ear bud

I guess the expensive price is to pay for the apple executives? First sad that their only in white. Gets dirty real fast! There large pods and you have to find the best angle cause after an hour they hurt. Sound quality could be better and volume isn’t as loud as I would desire. I’ll skip the name brand and could find something better for less cost out there.

review title: They work for a couple months and then don't! Dont buy!!!
review_body: At first I was so happy with this product, they worked great and made working out at the gym much easier without having a cord hanging getting in the way. However, after a couple months the battery life deteriorated. Rarely do both of the headphones sync together. Usually I get one to work for about 5 minutes and then it dies again. I am so disappointed as I saved up to buy these thinking they would be a worthwhile investment and they are NOT. I took very good care of them, didnt over use them and they still only lasted a couple months.

Great product again apple. They work with Siri and they are very easy to use. The only thing that I would change would be the size. My ears are small and they hurt my ears a bit. It would be great if they were padded a bit but for what they are and the inconvenient cord issue is solved. Love the touch feature. Also people can hear me very clearly.

review title: Broke within a month, Amazon is useless.
review_body: One of the Airpods stopped working completely within a month for no reason. I was a day or two out of the return window and Amazon were the useless money grubbing scumbags they always are and wouldn’t do a thing. I basically have to pay full price to repair or replace them through Apple. I despise this company so much. I’m deleting my account and credit card.

I could not possibly be happier with these things. I’ve only ever had a single hiccup with them, and I think it was the phone’s fault (couldn’t get them to ship to the next song). I take phone calls well, they take speech to text dictation well, and the way they read texts back to you is really great. Plus, the fact that you can find even a single lost one is pretty awesome.

Right airpod stopped working right after the 90 day period to return ended. I was warned not to buy AirPods from Amazon so can’t say I wasn’t. Now I have to deal with Apple’s awful warranty service to hopefully get it fixed/replaced.

I bought these because I always a wanted these . Price was reasonable so I jumped at them. After receiving them , I didn’t hear much bass which I enjoy. And my cousin told me about the Pro model which had more features and noise cancelling. . These are great AirPods for the price and sound great regardless.

I’ve been switching between wired headphones for my Mac laptop and iPhone since March when I realized my Mac wouldn’t stay connected to my non-Apple Bluetooth headphones and kept dropping during meetings. When we went back to iPhones in July, it didn’t occur to me that AirPods would be the perfect solution because they’re made for switching between apple products. Silly me! I’m actually looking forward to a week full of meetings, whether on my computer or phone!

review title: Love, love, love them! You will too!
review_body: Love, love, love them! I need to be quiet in the mornings while my husband is sleeping. It's so nice to be released from the earbud cord! I also prefer the airbuds to my ear/phone hands free device. These are better sound and more comfortable. I was a bit surprised at the cost but I use them daily so I decided it was reasonable for my situation. In hindsight, I'd recommend them to everyone so matter how often you may use them. I love them!

Had it for only about 6-7 months, and the case no longer charges, but stay at 0%. The earbuds seem to be charging, but they only hold power for a few hours. May be aberration, but a big disappointment given the limited period of time it has been used…

Apple support has been disappointing too.

I finally ditched my bose headphones since I felt like they looked unprofessional at work and I couldn't really use them in the car or for exercising. I love the wear these when I workout. I'm also much safer in my car now, I pop one in for my commute in case I want to use siri or pick up a call. The battery life is pretty good. I make it a few days at work using these 6 hrs a day before I have to charge the case.

I have a sudden hearing loss that was scheduled for surgery but with the delta variant this summer, it was postponed. I use the AirPods to hear virtual meetings and phone calls and listen to live conversations and meetings in person via Live Listen on my iPhone. They do a fantastic job of giving me hearing functionality that I had been lacking.

I just came here to say I've tried 3 other brands of "airpod" types of ear phones, all in an effort to avoid paying for the genuine Apple product. Cutting to the chase, all of the others pale in comparison in just about every aspect. Sound quality, connectivity to Apple devices, battery life... these genuine airpods are absolutely still many years ahead of every bit of the competition. Save yourself some time and $$ and just get these the first time.

review title: Got a dud apple store replaced for us
review_body: We got a bad set they would not connect at all to any device apple or not we ended up going to to the apple store and they gave us new ear buds for free. It was pretty frustrating but atleast we know they are real and still carry regular warranty just wished they worked on arrival video review for full in depth story on issue
